Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Logistics: edition 1.0. Product weight, tariffs and automatic delivery calculation.    It’s been already 2 weeks since the logistics section was launched on FLOGmall. During this time mistakes and bugs have been corrected, and now we’re glad to present this update to our dear users. The section includes the subsections "My Templates" and "Create a Template". Now each shop on the platform can specify regions, to which delivery of their goods is carried out ( all regions will be indicated in a template by default), and also exclude from the list countries in the specified region, to which delivery is not carried out (for example: delivery to Europe, except for Monaco).  Creating a template, a seller specifies its name (for example: "Delivery for Europe", "Delivery for North America"), name of the delivery service (ChinaPost, DHL and so on), delivery price for a kilogram of product (for example: 1 kg of product - 200 rubles) and time of delivery. The created template can be duplicated on all regions by the button “Apply to all”.  In a card of each product there is a new category “Weight”, which is set obligatorily by a seller while creating a new item. You can also fill this category for the goods created earlier.  Buyers can find a new section - "Delivery". For the authorized users a country, specified by them at registration in a private account, is established by default.  Ordering goods, for which a seller has already established tariffs, user can independently choose a country/mean of delivery and see a total amount of the order with delivery, and also the number of days, which it will take.  Shortly, for not authorized users the program automatically will be able to determine location of buyers by the IP address and to offer delivery options to their country. If delivery to the region is not available, user can contact the seller and specify this information.  Thus, delivery to your country and its cost are calculated automatically. Buyers don’t need to contact the seller personally to find out mentioned options anymore.  We remind you, that it is the first edition of logistics. Further, calculators of the most popular delivery services will be integrated on the platform (Chinapost, SDEK, etc.) to improve quality of service for our users. Thanks to these calculators, there will be an opportunity to determine the exact cost of delivery by a particular service directly.  Logistics launch is another step to full automation of shops on FLOGmall.  Also, our users will see global updating of design and conversion to beta-version of the website. Due to the mentioned conversion, interface of a seller and buyer remains without changes for a while (we understand, that it needs improvement, but at this stage such work will be senseless, since it will be changed in the beta of the website all together)  Stay tuned to see the latest news!  Sincerely yours,  FLOGmall.com

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Ready to work for MLC!  Dear friends! We have good news for everyone!  Both old and young Howard and Chang (And even you Carl)   Our token officially appeared on the FLOGmall.com platform! Moreover, not just appeared, went around and left. It appeared and proudly took its place in the list of cryptocurrencies. Now in ways of the choice of payment you can see these three cherished letters - MLC (MallCoin).    Are you ready?  We hope you are. Because you don't need to specify in the description to your goods and services "sell/buy for MLC" in a separate line. Now you can do this just by click of a mouse! So, run to correct the announcements - the nuance is resolved once and for all.  But that’s not all! We have an opportunity (and, above all - desire) to help You with promotion of your business. How exactly, you ask? Everything is simple. For all shops and even for private sellers, accepting for payment MLC, our PR program is starting. Under this program, we make TOPS of your best goods with all references and place them on our resources and channels, where they will be seen by thousands of people, who can instantly learn about your product. Therefore, even if you only begin your way in a field of sales - we are ready to provide you good starting audience directly here and now. Besides, we are developing bonus program for users accepting for payment a token MLC.  Do you sell for MLC? Then we go to you!  If you are a newcomer in the sphere of cryptocurrencies, but already understand the prospects and want to jump in this high-speed car of the future with little effort, without running the exchanges with a mumbo jumbo (hi to shamans) - You can get MLC just by selling any goods or service on FLOGmall.com for MLC and instantly receive the first currency. The task isn't more difficult than registration on a dating site. And you will receive letters not from perverts with an avatar of a cat with doubtful offers on a joint trip to Turkey, but from real buyers and sellers.  We are interested in increase in turnover of our tokens as well as in development of all cryptoindustry, that’s why we open for You various doors in this perspective, independent of financial institutions world, where each user can experience on himself all advantages of payment of goods for cryptocurrency. Here You and only You are an owner of Your business and Your future. It's up to you to decide in what currency you want to sell goods.  And our task is to provide comfortable conditions for all our users.  The last two weeks we've been keeping a silence vow, completely deep in checks, correction of mistakes, testing, a sacrificial offering (no). But don't worry! Soon, we will tell you in more detail about the technical moments in which we were engaged all this time. Don't you think that addition of a token on FLOGmall is all what we so long were silent about? Stay in touch not to miss the latest news.  New sections, categories, announcements of the interesting offers and shops selling and buying for MLC and introduction of new features await you.  Well, for now - don't waste time, the number of announcements promptly grows, the platform extends. And here it’s as in the morning bus - it is necessary to manage to take the best places before someone takes it, and you hadn't to stand pressed in the doorway and to breathe to someone in an armpit.  So, transactions with payment of MLC became even simpler and more available, so forward and only forward to conquer the world of business and to shop with FLOGmall.com!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: We ran high! +1000 points in rating on CoinMarketCap    The token MLC (MallCoin) has risen by one thousand points in the position rating on CoinMarketCap! And we hurry to share this joy with you, friends. We were waiting, waiting and, finally, have waited!  Currently, we take the 710th place in the list of world cryptocurrencies. Yes, to the Olympic indicators it’s still too far, but look what a progress in only one month! We have risen (no, we have just flown up!) almost by thousand points up and are going to reach at least Top-500 (and even above!) till the end of the year. And, of course, we can’t get a break until we get to TOP-100 of cryptocurrencies rating.  Yes, in fact, this indicator doesn't influence token cost as some might wish (everything is good in its season, let’s slow things down, ladies and gentlemen), for us it is very important not to creep at the end of the list, but to be the first everywhere and in everything. So, have patience, take cookies and watch the rating on CoinMarketCap.  If you are a newcomer or just don't know what in general CoinMarketCap is needed for, just let me make it clear. Thanks to this service you can see and monitor: capitalization of the company; average exchange value of MLC token (MallCoin); quantity of not frozen tokens in the current turn and also the exchanges at which the token is traded at present.  And, certainly, all indicators on MLC (MallCoin) are also there, we have nothing to hide. Our plans are so ambitious, our community grows, develops and gets stronger every day. And if You didn't become its part for some reason yet, then now is a right time! At the moment, as you can see, the importance of MLC token (MallCoin) is very underestimated and so far is at the lowest level. For this reason it is so profitable to get MLC tokens (MallCoin) today.  We remind you, that you can become an owner of MLC (MallCoin) by purchasing the token at the trade exchanges BTC-Alpha (https://btc-alpha.com/exchange/MLC_ETH/) and Simex.Global (https://simex.global/ru/exchange/mlc/usd) or you can go to FLOGmall.com and sell your goods or service for MLC (MallCoin). Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Iphone X will cost the holder of MLC (MallCoin) only 3.05 USD!  No, iPhone is not wooden. No, it is not chocolate. And no, it is not the Kuwaiti USD.    It is an absolutely real new IPhone X for only 3.05 USD. Sit down, please, dear detectives, we’re going to tell you what the point is. FLOGmall.com jointly with BTC-Alpha began a give away of IPhone X among TOP-100 users who have bought MLC tokens (MallCoin). And to join this list today and to fight for a prize you need to make purchase of tokens for only 3.05 USD (an approximate equivalent based on purchase of  MLC tokens (MallCoin) at a current rate). The ridiculous sum for an opportunity to win the most desired smartphone of this year, isn't that so?  So, the conditions. All users of the exchange, who due to results of a promotional action entered TOP-100 of the users who had bought MLC tokens for the largest sum, participate in this competition. The number of MLC of the user, which is a difference between purchase of MLC token (MallCoin) and sale throughout the competition, is considered. The winner of a competition will be chosen randomly by means of  https://randstuff.ru/number/ service.  But there is more to come. FLOGmall holds neither one, nor two, and even nor three, but the whole four competitions! And you can take part in each of them!  We have told you about the first competition, now go to the next ones. Big geeks and fans of #Marvel surely are aware that a new game #SpiderMan came out for #Playstation4 on the 7th of September. You’d like to play it, but you have no a game console? It doesn't matter! Here to you two ones! Make a one-time purchase at the exchange from 10 000 MLC tokens and get a chance to win the game console Playstation 4 PRO 1Tb. The one who will make the largest one-time purchase of MLC tokens at the exchange will become the first winner. The second winner will be chosen by means of https://randstuff.ru/number/ service among all users who will make a one-time purchase at the exchange from 10 000 tokens of MLC. Confidentially (though, not confidentially, all statistics are absolutely open and available on the website https://btc-alpha.com/coin/MLC/), only 12 users take part in the competition at the present moment, so, chances of a victory are just extremely high!  Competition number 3! If you are only going to join the sphere of cryptocurrencies or have already done it, but still haven't got a purse of cold storage, then this give away for you! The hardware wallet Trezor - a must have of each holder of cryptocurrency - allows you to secure keys and access to your account. And two little helper will be given away in our competition. To participate it is enough to buy tokens in the amount of 5 000 MLC and just to hold them on your account. Currently, there are only 5 participants in the competition, so it is almost prizes-for-all lottery!   And the last one, but isn’t last on value! For all users who have made purchase of MLC tokens at the exchange for any quantity throughout the entire period of an promotional action, we will give away 5 city backpacks XD Design 15.6 Click!   So, less than 2 weeks left till the end of the main give away of this fall, so hurry up! If you’ve been watching the market of cryptocurrencies for a long time, or just heard about it by chance, but still didn't decide to plunge into this new interesting world, then now it is a high time! It is an excellent opportunity not simply to make a successful purchase, but also to win awesome prizes! New Year's holidays are on the horizon, why not to give an excellent gift to yourself or to the relatives?  Support MLC (MallCoin), get our tokens and win together with FLOGmall.com! The results of all competitions will be summed up on the 13th of November.  Don't miss your chance! All details here: https://btc-alpha.com/news/14/

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Welcome to the club! Coin Prizm (PZM) is officially added on the FLOGmall.com platform as a payment method.    Many people daily write our managers with the requirement to add their coin or token on the platform as a payment method. Even fangirls, raging all day under Justin Bieber's windows can envy persistence of these guys. They have shown themselves as very active community, and we are glad to announce, that now You have an opportunity to make transactions for Prizm (PZM) cryptocurrency on FLOGmall.com.  So, some information on our newcomer: PRIZM (PZM) — is completely decentralized and self-regulating cryptocurrency. Concept of the cryptocurrency is based on two-factor mechanism of coins’ generation: forging and mining by means of the current balance of the account. The security system provides the forging, constructed on modern and energy efficient ECO-technologies of cryptocurrencies. PZM holds approximately the 430th place in the rating of cryptocurrencies on CoinMarketCap. As well as MLC token, PZM coin is traded on BTC-alpha.com. Currently, the approximate cost of PZM is $0,12. Approximate capitalization is $7 500 000.  We welcome new members of cryptocurrency community on FLOGmall! PRIZM (PZM) holders can attack shops of our platform right now, appealing to sell goods for their coin, whereas shops and private sellers - to use PRIZM (PZM) as a payment method for the goods and services. Now opportunities for purchases on FLOGmall.com became even wider!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Fixed it. Bug shall not pass! Video announcements, improved e-mail marketing and updated design on FLOGmall. Friday report on technical department’s work.    Some users could notice that e-mails about the actions made on the platform came to mail incorrectly, were lost somewhere on their way, didn’t reveal something or were too long on smoke breaks. Our fault, have to admit. But it’s fixed! Now notifications come to mail without delay, at any time: while registration, password recovery, purchasing, inquiries and replies to them. In short, nothing will escape from Your attention and interfere with sales.  Besides, from now on, buyers and sellers receive not just the notification that the order is made, but also detailed information on the order, including category and quantity of goods, total sum, time and other details. Besides, You can see new arrivals, which have appeared on the platform and interesting offers right here in your e-mail! Now our e-mails not only come precisely and in time, but also became more informative (and pretty; D).  We move towards visual changes. The footer has been updated this week. New design, and, above all - new options. And while the section of categories is in development (we will launch them soon), each new user will be able to find important information on FLOGmall, economy of the project and its history, and also convenient direct links on the exchanges for MLC (MallCoin).token purchase.  Let’s look on the most important updating of the week, namely - opportunities to add a video presentation to cards of goods, to shop’s description or to personal ads of the seller. This is the first, but very important step in development of functionality of Live Store and work on video elements of the platform. Now you can show the goods on a photo, as well as to show them from all angles in the LIVE mode! And, the most important - it is not necessary to be registered anywhere, load video on the other websites and to insert long links, FLOGmall will do everything for you.  More information about video on FLOGmall and joint integration with Viuly.io can be found in the next post. Therefore, friends, stay in touch and don't miss the latest news!  Sincerely Yours, FLOGmall.com

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Shops on FLOGmall will attract bloggers from Viuly video hosting for promotion of the catalog of goods.     Friends, as you know, we have announced our cooperation with a blockchain video hosting Viuly.io long time ago. For those, who have missed this information, our platform includes also a video format. Video presentations of shops, goods and services - this is more convenient and informative, other than only a picture and text. As they say, it’s better once to see, than hundred times to read.   From now on, you can not only place bright photos and the detailed description on FLOGmall.com, but also present your product in a video format; to describe it in detail, and, above all - to show your goods and shop in whole by means of a video presentation.   In other words, you can create and load the whole video presentation of your shop and also add separate videos to a card of each concrete product. Same concerns also private sellers (why to photograph, for example, the car if it is possible just to film it with the camera from all angles?)   All videos, loaded by you on our platform automatically get saved and placed on a Viuly.io hosting. You don't need to be registered anywhere, insert long links or to complicate this process by any means. We take all technical part upon ourselves! Now offers on FLOGmall became even more interesting and informative!   But it is only the first step of our partnership with a video hosting. Soon, FLOGmall shops will have an opportunity to promote their goods via bloggers, who post their videos on Viuly.io.How exactly?  For example, a blogger shows in his video some product, which can be purchased in FLOGmall Store (for instance, popular caps). The Store and blogger agree upon cooperation on mutual beneficial conditions (percentage from each sale), and now, when the product appears in the video, you can see the direct link to its purchasing on FLOGmall on the screen. Viewer follow the link, buys the product and blogger gets his deserved percentage.  For all shops of FLOGmall, which will want to cooperate with bloggers, a convenient system of placement of goods for collaborations will be installed. In other words, shops will have a possibility to choose particular products for such promotion. For example, new arrivals or special offers.  How exactly this function will be implemented from technical point of view, we will tell You on the stage of installing and testing of the functionality. Follow the news and stay in touch with FLOGmall.

Our team will contact you to clarify all the details on sending prizes in the nearest future. We ask all other participants not to get upset - it’s not the first and not the last competition! You still will have a great range of opportunities to take part and try your luck together with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Saturday report on work of our team. Nomenclature release for product positions at shops, cart upgrade and status sections for online stores’ ads.    Work on the nomenclature of product positions is completed. The functionality of a product nomenclature is finished and updated on the website. Now each online store can set up to 2 modifications to each card of goods.  Automatically, one of modifications in each card of goods is color. At the same time, modification "color" is not obligatory and seller can remove it. Each modification has a restriction - no more than 7 variations. Thus, each product  can have no more than 2 modifications with 7 variations in each of them.  If the online store has a need for the bigger number of modifications, then it should create higher number of goods.  For example: Smartphone Apple iPhone Xs. Modification No. 1 Colour: Gold, Silvery, Grey space. Modification No. 2 Memory: 64 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB.  This section is extremely important for the platform. Now purchases can be carried out without need in communication between buyer and seller. Also it will allow FLOGmall team to implement automatic import of goods from the online stores, created on popular CMS platforms.  Upgrade of a buyer cart. Now all users have an opportunity to add products in a cart without authorization on the website. The platform will remember items in your cart, and after authorization or registration of the user on the website, it will continue processing of the order.  We want to note that after processing of the order on FLOGmall, both buyer and seller receive e-mail with detailed information on product positions and its modifications. Thus, a seller on FLOGmall will be able to react to new orders quicker, and a buyer will be able to make sure (once again) that everything is right.  Mass loading of images into a product card by online stores. The system of adding of images into product card is updated. Now shops can add all images by one click and move them with the necessary sequence after loading on FLOGmall. This innovation will allow online stores to create quickly even the most difficult design product positions.  Note, that if You use video in your product cards, then it will be always displayed on the first place.  The statuses of ads for online stores. Now, after creation of the ads online stores will be able to see its current status (rejected, on moderation, removed) in their account. In the conclusion of today's report we’d like to remind you of the results of the competition on BTC-Alpha and to congratulate once again future owners of prizes from FLOGmall! We ask you to pay special attention to need of providing contact information by all the winners for sending gifts. Also, we will be very grateful for your feedback in our official Vkontakte page of FLOGmall  https://vk.com/icoflogmall?w=wall-157679359_2030 or in our official Telegram chat: https://tele.click/flogmallru Video with results of the competition is available by the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=On7Lyuyf-UY  Sincerely Yours, FLOGmall.com

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Meet updated FLOGmall! We have moved about!    Hello, dear friends! Today we are here with strategic news: FLOGmall is officially moving about! Not geographically as someone could expect but to the main domain! Read below about the ‘place’  you can buy your favorite products from the alpha version!  This weekend, our developers have made a good transfer of the platform alpha.flogmall.com to the main domain. Attention! The alpha version on which you used to buy and sale goods for cryptocurrency is officially located at flogmall.com now. And now all the development and future changes will be located at this address. It does not matter what you are thinking about at the moment: about alpha, beta or already mature product!  Why did we do it?  Because all the traffic that we receive every day from the mad number of links recorded on different resources and social networks, went directly to the site, which not long ago held the legendary ICO. And, although we do not forget about it, ICO is already a little history and it does not make any sense to transfer a new audience to this site. But we all remember why we are here - to develop the platform, so from this day on, FLOGmall radically changes the strategy!  We begin a huge layer of work on the development and investigation of the platform. Now the main task is to increase the audience, attract new happy users and stores that risk to develop in the future so much that they will become a full-fledged organized ecosystem. For our part, we promise you to bring the functionality of the platform to perfection, repackaging of social networks and new cool content, and we ask you to help us in expanding the community. Tell your friends about FLOGmall, repost in social networks and you will be rewarded!  It is worth saying that we did not bury the site that was dedicated to ICO, it just moved to the domain flogmall.io, on which our mirror was situated for a long time. If you really miss the old landing page, you can visit it as easily as the previous one, log in and pass KYC procedure (for those who procrastinate so much that haven’t done it yet).  The main platform will get visual updates as well. We plan to introduce new sections. The section "about FLOGmall" will tell you how FLOGmall was born, who are the pioneers of your favorite project and why it is called ‘a new ecosystem of the future’. The "Help and assistance” section will contain all the detailed instructions on how to use the site. Also we are waiting for the section “Partners", sections on the ecosystem and MLC, promotional offers, where we will post all the purchases for MLC with an unprecedented discount and products with cashback. At the moment the nomenclature is entered in the test mode, and still our developers work on the improved version of safe transactions. But all these updates will be the subject of separate posts.  If there were tab pages with old links to alpha in your browser, do not worry, all the accumulated material will not be wasted! We have made a full redirect, and all of them can be opened the same way but on a new domain. There may be some failures, because we are still testing all our innovations, therefore if you are so attentive that you happen to find a mistake - text us about it, do not bottle up your feelings:)  FLOGmall stays with you and prepares a lot of interesting things! So, keep your finger on the pulse. See you on the new site!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Ink or crypto currency? INK has appeared on FLOGmall!  We have news! A new token has been added to big FLOGmall family! Meet Ink Protocol or XNK for short!    Ink Protocol is ERC20 based token (like native MLC) for online trade. This is the newest payment system on Listia market.  Users who already registered on Listia Credits have their own balance which soon will be transformed into XNK tokens. Decentralization, freedom, security - Ink Protocol motto. Guys are for secured acceptance and sending of payment.  XNK also allows to publish open feedbacks for every transaction and make personal decentralized reputation which will help you to identify yourself. Token has many usages for Listia Marketplace, but the main idea is to implement a single payment system for buyers and sellers. Moreover, users have an opportunity to earn XNK. It works like credit system.  Clients may benefit from shifting to XNK because it is going to become interchangeable and doesn’t want to lose at trading. Listia benefit from not serving as a central bank which needs to regulate listing credits.  If you are a member of Ink Protocol family, we are happy to meet you on our platform. Help your token to develop! Now you can buy any goods and services with XNK and spread the idea among society!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: We greet the citizens of the first decentralized state together with FLOGmall!  Welcome to all the  crypto-enthusiasts! As far back as in 1516 Sir Thomas More wrote “Utopia” - a novel about an ideal democratic state, with a developed economy and humanistic principles. We declare, the idea has gone beyond the books! Such a state is quite possible in a modern society and it is called Decenturion! Happy end is guaranteed:)    Way back in May, the founder of the Cryptonomics Capital Fund Nikolai Evdokimov announced the creation of the "world's first blockchain state" Decenturion. It should become a model of a fair and honest state that promises us equality.  Many of you have already heard about this state and, for sure, read quite ambiguous reviews. Someone strongly believes in the project and considers the emergence of a decentralized state to be a logical continuation of the development of the crypto-community. Others say Decenturion is another Titanic, which is doomed to drown on the way to the Islands, where it will settle forevermore.  But one thing we know for sure: just three months have past and according to the official website it has already got more than 250 thousand residents. Decenturion uses decentralized technologies in Economics, law and social sphere and also helps to introduce them to other states.  What is more, it promises its citizens direct earnings from each startup that has become a part of the state. Now it is in the process of acquiring the territory, that will give the Decenturion the right not only to obtain the status of an independent state, but also to become a full member of the UN. We suppose you have already guessed what we are driving at…  Right! FLOGmall entered into a collaboration with Decenturion and now we are linked by a single blockchain. We got acquainted with the plans of the project, felt their benefits and thrilled with the idea. Decenturion members as well as we are rooting for the development of Crypto-Industry, therefore, the becoming an infrastructure project for the citizens of the state means to give an impetus to the development of a new branch of the crypto-community world.  On the whole, we would like to note that such a cooperation will influence the development of FLOGmall a great deal. We believe it with every fibre of our being. Just imagine - the whole society will benefit from our platform that provides services, purchase and sale of goods inside the latest state. The scale of the idea makes one feel dizzy!  The conditions of intrusion of the project on the territory of ecosystem involve issuing for the citizens: our platform will release additional DMLC  tokens that could be used within the Decenturion ecosystem. All in all it was produced 100 million DMLC tokens, 50 million of which were distributed equally among the population of the new state. About the function of these tokens, and what backers will absolutely appreciate thanks to this collaboration, read below!  DMLC tokens will be used by citizens of the decentralized state and people who want to buy our altcoins from them and act as a discount on FLOGmall platform services.  Any resident of Decenturion will be able to pay up to 25% of the cost of services on our platform, and the remaining 75% one has to pay in traditional MLC.   Thus, citizens of the decentralized state automatically become direct participants of our platform and also DMLC token traders around the world (of course, it can also be sold to others who wish to hold a new token). So, what we have: a limitless backbone of FLOGmall agents around the world who will promote the idea of our platform to the masses and bring to FLOGmall even more users from different parts of the world.  If you are a direct owner of MLC who has just begun to worry about the fate of your token - it is not worth it, you only benefit from it. Because each new user, seller, buyer on the store of the platform - it does not matter, will increase the demand for MLC tokens.  In fact, DMLC is a promotional token with a limited edition dedicated to such an enviable partnership. This token will not be brought to the stock exchange by us, and it has no Mallcoin functionality. MLC has always been a beloved first-born and it saves it’s position. All services of the platform, the official rate of ATES and purchase of goods on the official store are tied only to our token. So, are you ready for the new members of our family?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Let listing MLC start on BTC-Alpha. The second exchange and the promotional action together with BTC-Alpha will be a nice bonus!    So, crypto-enthusiasts! We are glad to tell you that our token is gradually developing the exchange space, and today we are pleased to announce listing on the second exchange, which is already familiar among CIS users.  The Next move is BTC-ALPHA. This is a fairly young (founded in 2016) but promising cryptocurrency exchange, which has introduced more than 90 currency pairs for digital currency. Today the exchange has more than 200 thousand users with accounts with positive account balances.The traders  are mainly from CIS countries and primarily from Russia, but traders from such countries as the United States, Romania, India, Japan are also included. The exchange is actively developing and constantly updating its functionality.  In the nearest future, on September 13, MLC will officially enter the BTC-ALPHA exchange. As for now we offer you to register at this platform as soon as possible to start trading immediately at the right time.  We have made small talk with the CEO of the exchange Vitaly Bodnar, who, by the way, is also our compatriot, and decided to ‘comb’ the listing of the MLC token on the exchange with a promotional action for the entire community. So, are you in a fever of anticipation? Any ideas what FLOGmall has for you this time?  The announcement of the contest and all the detailed conditions will be published in the next post. Register at BTC-ALPHA and follow the news carefully!  See you on FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: ATTENTION! CONTEST GAME! Do you know what surprise FLOGmall together with BTC-Alpha uncorked for you?  We have reported that the beginning of trading for MLC token on BTC-Alpha will take place on 13 September at 14:00 Moscow time.    By no means we want the second MLC listing pass unnoticed. That  is why we have prepared a contest for the active community. We have 10 prizes. The duration of the contest is 60 days (through November 12. Every user has an opportunity to take part in it. Even if you purchase just 1 MLC on the BTC-Alpha stock exchange, you're on board! Now a bit more about the prizes and conditions of 4 competitions from FLOGmall. Well, control your emotions, please…  So, the 10 prizes are divided between the 4 competitions and unlimited number of users from all over the world. FLOGmall puts on the line the following prizes:  Iphone X 64 GB - 1 pc. https://alpha.flogmall.com/product/5a8f12b5d8de070187c5a207  Playstation 4 PRO 1TB - 2 pc. https://alpha.flogmall.com/product/5b8ea39485bf30000740a4d6  Trezor Hardware Wallet - 2 pc. https://alpha.flogmall.com/product/5b113e08dd5bb60005602413  XD Design Bobby - 5 pc. https://alpha.flogmall.com/product/5a8f1157d8de070187c5a1f1  FLOGmall counts only on the wide audience. So, to get into each segment for sure, we have divided the contest game into four different competitions each user can participate.  Contest 1. Prize: Iphone X 64 GB - 1 pc. For top-100 users who bought the largest amount of MLC tokens  Conditions for participation: This competition is open to all exchange users who, following the results of the campaign, entered the top-100 users who bought the largest amount of MLC tokens. The number of a user’s MLC is taken into account, that is a spread between buying MLC tokens and selling them during the listing.  The winner of the contest will be chosen by means of the  random service  https://randstuff.ru/number/  Contest 2. Prize: Playstation 4 PRO 1TB - 2 pc. Make a one-time purchase on the exchange in the amount of 10 000 MLC tokens  Conditions for participation: In this competition there will be two winners.The participant who will make the largest single purchase of MLC tokens on the exchange will become the winner number 1. Minimal possible purchase for the raffle of this prize is 10 000 mlc.  Winner number 2 will be chosen by means of the  random service  https://randstuff.ru/number/ among all the users who will make a one-time purchase on the exchange in the amount of  at least 10 000 MLC tokens.  Contest 3. Prize:  Trezor Hardware Wallet - 2 pc. Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Attention, Bounty Hunters! You will receive unfrozen tokens two weeks earlier than you could expect!    One says if your bounty hunters love MLC more than Bitcoin they are perfect. Our bounty hunters belong to this category, therefore, today we appeal to you, our dear!  By the way, we will be sending you UNFROZEN tokens at once! We promised to unfreeze your tokens on October 20, but due to a slight change in the rules, we will distribute them to you two weeks earlier the scheduled date of unfreezing, that is, since October 8!  We would like to apologize in advance for technical inconsistencies and delay in token distribution. The delay has occurred due to some features of our Smart-contract, which does not provide mass distribution of tokens. Therefore, to distribute tokens this way, we have to do it manually. There are 5500 bounty hunters, on average, sending tokens to one recipient takes 10 minutes or so.Therefore, by simple mathematical calculations, we can understand that Frodo will deliver the ring to Mordor even a little faster than we will send such amount of Mallcoin manually.  The most significant is that our Smart-contract sends frozen tokens. In fact, we would send you frozen MLC during six months, then we would manually  send commands to each transaction to unfreeze tokens, which would take another half a century. That was why in order not to waste time and not to grow old together while anticipating, we decided to do the following: we began to create a Smart-contract that would be able to send tokens en masse.  Our Smart-contract sends frozen MLC to the new Smart-contract, which has the super power of mass unloading, that will send tokens directly to you in blocks at once. But there are some pitfalls. This Smart-contract cannot send frozen tokens. Technically, we cannot now hedge at this point, because, objectively, we understand even if we send you unfrozen mallcoins and strictly threaten you not to spend them before the deadline, a good half of you will consider us mad and won't care a dime any ignominious ban. Also, if we freeze all the sent tokens manually, we will spend a lot of your and our time, nerves and money, and in the end, still miss a couple of dare-devils.  So, the most optimal and mutually pleasant version is to start a mass distribution of already unfrozen MLC two weeks earlier than expected, since October 8. That is, the first bounty hunters will start receiving their tokens this day. According to the preliminary plan, the distribution will take a week, but, even if the worst scenario takes place, by October 20, each bounty participant will become a full MLC holder. And since the day of pay one can dispose of his/her tokens as he/she wishes. To cut a long story short, you can start thinking over the plans on your amount of cool tokens.  What is more, for the most active members of our community, we are preparing a new way of making money with the help of your favorite project. We are launching a new referral link, where you can involve your friends into the project, earn on their purchases and grab a good bonus for broadcasting the project news. So, do not forget that not only FLOGmall keeps watch over you, but you also have to follow FLOGmall! The referral link is in development by now and it is ready to fly into the operation next month.  By the way, as soon as you get your MLC, you can safely participate in the new competition from FLOGmall together with BTC-Alpha exchange, which is now listing our token! Haven’t you hear about it? Then follow the link https://www.facebook.com/flogmallico/posts/983405345199594, there you will find all the details of the opportunity to win 10 valuable prizes with us!  Thank you for your understanding and support! Don't worry, every bounty hunter will get his/her rightful tokens up to the last 0.0001 MLC! Stay on FLOGmall and follow our news!

If you forgot what it is and why it’s as important as to see a doctor once a year, we repeat the important information!  KYC is a control responsibility, which literally means “know your client”. That’s a  specific way to identificate a person, which is used by most of the respectable ICO. Why is it necessary? Because it is a protection of both sides. And today FLOGmall finally begins this procedure!  By the way, MLC tokens can be defrosted only after you complete the KYC procedure. Unfortunately, not all the users gave feedbacks, but we are sure that it was not because of bad intentions, but modesty. However we received some feedbacks, and one of them drew our attention. As a devoted worker of his platform, and consequently holder of kickcoin tokens, Anzor used his tokens as a method of payment! Do you see how many methods of payments are already working! So, read further!  “In April I ordered several products as a present at alpha-version of FLOGmall: iPhone X, Airpods and wireless charge. I was contacted in an hour and was told about the whole process of payment, everything was fast and easy! It was delivered in two weeks in a good package. Everything was beautiful and tidy, the present made a lot of happiness!   Feel free to leave feedbacks and we will publish them! It’s bad to keep everything inside you, so express your feelings! Write us how FLOGmall helped you to find your dream product, allowed to pay for it with cryptocurrency and was delivered very fast! If you have some comments how to improve our platform or have some unpleasant opinion about specific store, please don’t make any misunderstanding between us! Write to our managers!  So, thank you for being with. Look at alpha version, there are new products again, look at interface which is becoming more and more different, and tell your friends about us! And if you are a kickcoin or any other altcoin holder, it will be twice happy to test our platform and buy stuff with your favourite token for you!  Are you ready to start shopping? Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: The end of FLOGmall ICO and new international holiday for crypto holders!  Guys, the most important day of this year has come! And we are not talking about New Year, elections or release of new Iphone! Today the FLOGmall ICO has ended! Cheers!  It was a long way, it seemed this day was so far away, but finally it has come! In January we only launched our project and now we have such an amazing result! Months came as fast as age of Jennifer Aniston, so only counter can show how much fundamental work have been made!  That we would have 23 212 696 $$ in 52 587,84 ETH! Thousands of happy users are looking through their personal accounts and soon will obtain bonuses! And no less than new product at alpha version which people buy with cryptocurrency every day! During the ICO we made 26 collaborations with altcoins, lots of partnerships,conferences and summits, were on the air at Nasdaq, and coming listing  - are only a small part of what we have done!  We want to express big gratitude for your trust and support, for your kind and sometimes not kinds responses - any feedback motivated us. FLOGmall finishes its stage of age and enter a new period of life.  Ahead we and, of course, you as full members of platform and a big FLOGmall family will have lots of interesting!  Mailing of bonus tokens will start right after end of ICO and will continue for 7 days. In only 7 days all users will be able to count bonuses and try all benefits of early participation in ICO! Its benefits will obtain also members of our referral program, and also all the winners of our FLOGmall giveaways.  Each early holder of MLC tokens will enter the KYC procedure, which will allow to identify your contractor fully and prevent different financial operations.  You know that we’ll have listing of our tokens at the exchange. And it means that soon our tokens will become an adult person and will increase its value.  Shipping of FLOGmall t-shirts for ordering at FLOGmall and your deposits also won’t take long! Shipping is about to start.  Alpha version also will change a lot. The function on the platform, work on ATES, new stores and sure shopping with MLC which you were waiting for so long will start after the end of ICO! And it’s gonna be legendary, guys!  Stay with us, hold our MLC tokens, learn about all the nice things at FLOGGmall and stay tuned to our updates! So many cool events are ahead, so you can’t miss it!  THANK YOU!  ❤️

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Football championship is lost, blockchain championship is obtained! Let’s learn about UK from the new perspective.  Our Sunday heading “Research” is back! Today we’re going to have a look at foreign cryptocurrency. Fasten your belts, we move to UK!  Big Innovation Centre, Deep Knowledge Analytics organization and DAG Global company made a research. In result they have found that UK would become the global center of blockchain technologies and the leader of cryptocurrency market by the 2022. As we ironically say in Russia, London is the capital of Great Britain, but it also holds all the necessary resources to conquer the cryptocurrency market.  “Blockchain was accepted by Parliament as an important technology. Parliament is ready to support the creation and development of digital economics with the help of various government initiatives” - concluded the head of Big Innovation Center Birgitte Anderson.  By the 2017-2018 people have invested more than 500 million pounds to British blockchain projects. Besides, it is said in the report that blockchain industry is only beginning to develop, but UK has all the chances to become a leader in this realm.  “UK is one of the most important world’s financial centers and recently has become a leader in financial technologies. At the same time, the country shows a big potential to become a leader of blockchain technologies and crypto economics” - stated head of DAG Global Sean Kiernan.  Also, it  was suggested to establish a position of the Head of Blockchain in government. And even without well-known British humour.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: ATTENTION, guys! IMPORTANT INFORMATION! This day has come…  The day when ICO will stop! This day has come! FLOGmall in tears… because we are so happy!  We remind you that today is the last day of FLOGmall ICO! And also the last opportunity to buy MLC tokens with an attractive price! It’s like a black Friday but in July. There’s no limits, you can buy as much as your wallet can contain, because your future profit depends on the number of your tokens now.  Cause today is the last day when the bonuses 20-25% from FLOGmall are available. On the 21st of July at 2 a.m. Moscow time all the bonuses will fade away and you won’t be able to buy tokens with the best price! Time is running out!  There won’t be any extensions! Tomorrow you’ll wake up and see that you can buy MLC tokens only at the exchange or you need to wait till the official start of the ATES. And it’s another story. So don’t let other parties into your relationships with FLOGmall, keep the magic of attractive price!  Also we have some unpleasant news. Since yesterday we have received massive attacks on our official websites. It is not dangerous, but unpleasant and even understandable because of the coming end of ICO. Our team successfully deals with the temporary difficulties and now sites are working. Soon all the attempts will be reduced to zero.  In some countries or regions problems with interface can still occur. If during the day you will have some problems with entering your private account or website, don’t worry, we will prevent all the difficulties during the day.  Do you want to buy our tokens at our platform, but can’t because of technical reasons? Then you can buy MLC tokens at our partners KICKICO https://www.kickico.com/ru/campaigns/51872/flogmall and Klooway https://klooway.com/preview?id=145173e1-8e5b-4fb9-a0fa-95c5fa7619de .  Stay tuned and thank you for your trust!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Are you ready to pay in the subway with cryptocurrency?  Have you noticed that all shopping malls, means of transport an even convenient stores in your town started to use contactless payment which no one could imagine before? Then what if we tell you that approximately in 10 years bitcoin and all other altcoins will become the most widespread method of payment for goods and services?  You don’t believe it? The research group from Imperial College London and Social Investment Network eToro came to such conclusion and published a report called ‘Cryptocurrencies: Overcoming Barriers to Trust and Adoption’. British researchers consider that if we want the world to embrace cryptocurrency, the following functions should belong to them: store of value, means of accumulation, medium of exchange and unit of account. Moreover, researches are sure that cryptocurrency is already can be treated as means of accumulation.  Research group underlines that ‘if bitcoin and other digital currency want to correspond to the last two criteria, they will require a progress in such realms as scalability, user interface and control.  In 1723 the first arithmetic machine came out, almost 200 years after, in 1942,  Atanasoff-Berry Computer was developed, and the first email was delivered in 1971. Only 30 years after the technology became popular because of the user-friendly Hotmail interface. The first bitcoin transaction took place almost 8 years ago, and today we can see that it is becoming to be suitable for requirements which are intended for fiat money. Researches from eToro consider that bitcoin and other cryptocurrency will become common in approximately 10 years. Of course there are barriers, but it’s possible to overcome them.  Not so long ago we published analysis of Ipsos company, which made a research about acceptance of new technologies in Europe, Australia and USA. It turned out that people would become more interested in cryptocurrency and blockchain in the nearest future.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: World Cup FIFA 2018. France vs. Croatia. And the last one hundred from FLOGmall!  Guys, who could expect such an outcome in World Cup FIFA 2018? When it was the last time our team received bets for Croatia we couldn’t even imagine that soon we would meet it in the final FLOGmall’s competition! It is the most surreal World Cup FIFA in the entire history (yes,the place speaks for itself )  Guys! On the 15th of July at 18.00 Moscow time France and Croatia will meet each other in final game on the main russian pitch! FLOGmall will receive your bets and make giveaway of last 1600$ in MLC tokens. We would cry a little because it was so cool to compete with you!  Be focused, guys! That’s really the last chance! Close your eyes, listen to your inner voice and it will show you the right answer. Let’s go!  Rules are very simple:  1. Fill in the form about match outcome. 2. Make a repost and join group. 3. Support your team and wait for the results. 4. IMPORTANT! One repost in the social media + one email address = ONE bet. If there are more that one bet, all will be deleted except for the first.  Rules of competition:  1. To be a member of https://www.facebook.com/flogmallico/ 2. To fill in the form: https://goo.gl/zf4iUY 3. To make a repost of this post: https://goo.gl/upz2gS 4. Don’t delete repost before the end of competition. 5. The winner will be chosen among the members who’ll guess match outcome. The winner will get 1600$ in MLC tokens! 6. The results will be announced on the 16th of July. If there are more members who’ll guess the score, the winner will be chosen with the website.  IMPORTANT: we accept bets related only to full time and overtime. Why? Because the amount of possible variants related to penalty kicks can rise up as high as temperature in the south of Russia in summer So, if you put ‘draw’ in the full time, you still need to name the supposed winner after penalty kicks, because in play-off there’s no such thing as draw. In the rest rules are the same, sum is 1600$ in MLC tokens. So, let’s go!  Please read the rules properly and you won’t lose the chance to get the win due to carelessness!

Body: What it is like to be rich, or or we have 26 friends!!  Guys, we finish our acquaintance, so meet the last altcoin on this week - AdEx (ADX). It is the 26th cryptocurrency added as a method of payment and yes, FLOGmall creates partners faster than Marvel new Avengers.  AdEx is blockchain-based Ethereum exchange for advertising. The goal of the platform is to replace traditional patterns of internet advertisement like YandexDirect or Google AdSense. Smart-contract as a main benefit is a key feature of all FLOGmall’s partners. AdEx guarantees no agents, which provide crystal clarity for the whole system from choosing the advertisement to payment. All the functions are defined in smart-contract, which makes realization of process much easier and guaranteed.  At the moment team of AdEx developers work on prototype, which will include solutions of new level. It will allow advertisers to communicate with buyers without transaction delay.  Not so long ago AdEx informed its users about collaboration with NEO cryptocurrency. Some people even call it chinese ethereum. Developers are planning to relocate the platform to NEO blockchain, which will allow to improve the platform. To be more precise, it predicts that platform will support some types of digital assets, will run decentralized trading, obtain digital certificate to provide trust to public blockchain and legal protection of all its assets, digitized through NEO platform, support several programming languages like C #, Javascript, Python, Go and others, plus provide absolute interchain compatibility.  By January 2019, AdEx developers will have released platform AdEx v.2. Work of this platform will focus to satisfy needs of rising amount of clients and advertisers who use the platform. Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Let’s continue to put the cards on the table.  Who else is FLOGmall’s partner?  We continue to present the brotherhood of mallcoin, and today it is the 25th, almost anniversary altcoin - it is APIS. Love and cherish!  APIS is absolutely new paradigm of investment. Within the project is implemented one of the most modern strategies of algorithm designing. Developers use the ordinary blockchain platform and improve some of its aspects which is in result “the most secure and fast blockchain-protocol”.  Project is developing a version called “‘lowering the entry barriers”, which will expand the base of blockchain and open the new era in crypto industry. To implement such a version, APIS is about to present a Masternode mediation platform with Mainnet. Such innovation will allow everyone to invest  through Masternode.  The company guarantees the necessary level of protection for storage and transaction making. The high level of protection allows Apis token to protect all your data and guarantees your contracts security. All information goes through the special secure server, and the company just keeps information and doesn’t use it for other purposes.  The foundation of Apis Token algorithm is based on market research which has been working out for 15 years. Developers found out that objective reasons were not the only cause of market fluctuations. It was also psychological reasons. In case of the last happened abrupt ups and downs of currency. The same can relate to cryptocurrency market. Artificial intelligence analized all the causes of such ups and downs and excluded it from the exchange rate. As a result, company promises to provide users with regular income without fear to lose invested money. In general, according to developers’ opinion, artificial intelligence allows to get the best out of the currency fluctuations without losing money which were invested. Minimal rate for investment will stay on the same level, while general rate of cryptocurrency will continue to rise.  APIS cryptocurrency is not for mining. It means that all the tokens of this cryptocurrency were released at once and  can be released only by developers of this cryptocurrency. The amount of released tokens at the moment can be estimated as 4,416,350,572 tokens.  APIS token is now listed on Bit-Z, IDAX and its platform is developed to the level of closed Beta.  APIS has been already added as a method of payment! Go to the alpha version of website, buy goods and stay with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Mastercard begins to hang out with blockchain transactions    The blockchain breaks new ground in financial services. Mastercard creates a system for performing anonymous transactions in the blockchain network. Taking in account real hostility to cryptocurrencies, the corporation decides to adopt some technologies.  A patent for a system, designed to facilitate the transaction`s speed in the blockchain was mentioned on the website of the US Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) in the description of solutions of the problems. According to the Mastercard document, the transparent nature of the blockchain is an obstacle for the integration of this technology for daily payments. The innovation will be applied both for business and individual consumers.  Imagine, for example, someone wants to give a gift to a person without letting him know the details of this transaction. Moreover, a lot of companies will not be interested in providing for competitors and other third parties with such data as the volume of transactions.  To solve this problem, Mastercard Corporation has found a solution that helps to make the transaction, the details of which will be publicly available in order to preserve the credibility of the data. At the same time, it is impossible to track transactions and information on the transaction, by which it is possible to identify its participants. But you know that a number of cryptocurrencies are based on the anonymity of transactions.  Mastercard decided to do it otherwise, and to achieve anonymity without using a publicly-available digital currency, perhaps even trying to keep the ability for law agencies to track illegal transactions. Although this point is not described in details in this patent.  While the cryptocurrency is using p2p transactions, the Mastercard system still relies on a third-party server that maintains a user profile database. Together with the identity data, each profile contains a "top secret" section. After receiving information about the transaction from the company, the server hashes the transaction information, combining it with a secret section in the profile. After that, the hash can be published in the blockchain in order to prove the integrity of the transactions without revealing their specific details.  By the way, Mastercard has a large number of patents for development of blockchain in recent times. This Corporation is studying the technologies of the distributed registry for the verification of payment systems.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall’s ICO from any other ICOs is the built-in automatic exchange of tokens, that is called ATES (Automatic token exchange service), FLOGmall to another cryptocurrency. The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site. When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH, which is higher than the selling of MLC tokens on the pre-ICO and ICO stages. After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

We are looking through the feedbacks of their lucky owners, and now you can have a look at some of them. This feedback is from Bulgaria. Yes, friends, did you think that we are working only for Russia?  We will post feedbacks not for boasting, but for evidence. Evidence of the hard work of our project and now you will see how easy is to get gifts from FLOGmall. FLOGmall has respect for the promise. And you?  If you have already tried all the bonuses of our website by yourself, and you are overwhelmed by positive emotions and you can not wait and you want to share them, then write to our support team, maybe we are waiting exactly for you! Almost every day FLOGmall sends orders, and if you have already received the package from our project - do not be shy and write your thoughts about it to us! You will help to develop the website with your feedbacks, whether positive or negative.  In general, first feedback is below, as well photo, read! *This feedback was written in Russian, but we translated it for you*  "Hello! I bought MLC tokens for 5 ETH, on June 7th, 2018, and received bonus after 10 working days in Bulgaria, as it was promised by FLOGmall! It was pretty fast, I didn't expect it. I received this Ledger wallet in Bulgaria by delivery service DHL. Everything was exactly as you promised. Thank you very much!"  Well, friends! First delivery to Bulgaria - done :white_check_mark: ! Do not be afraid, send your feedback, our support team is already ready! Tell everyone about your cooperation with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Try to predict the future: what will happen to blockchain next year?  European experts analyzed how modern society understands the technology of blockchain and they predicted that interest to blockchain will grow. Such studies are conducted annually, taking into account sex, age and ethnic characteristics of the respondents. The last one was held from March 26th till April 6th in 2018 and it covered 15 countries, each of which had about thousand respondents.  The results showed that 66% of Europeans know about the existence of cryptocurrency. Someone will say, super, it is more than the half. But the FLOGmall team has an eye twitching that there are still people in this world that don't know about the existence of a digital currency, while our users are buying goods with it.  Nevertheless, 35% still agreed that the crypto industry is "the future of online purchases". Another 35% predicted its excellent growth in the next year.  If we consider the world statistics, in general, the population's awareness about the cryptocurrency is more than 50%. The title of the country, where people know about cryptocurrency the most, goes to Austria - 79% and Poland - 77%, while in the United States only 57% of people know what the crypto and tokens mean.  Only 1/10 of respondents had cryptocurrency ever. Moreover, the survey showed that users of online-bank applications are much more likely to have cryptocurrency than those who are far from using such applications. Guess where is the highest percentage of crypto assets? No, not in China. In Turkey! 18%, the lowest one showed Luxembourg - 4%.  25% of respondents noted that they are planning to buy some tokens soon. While most people continue to consider cryptocurrency as a dangerous investment. They think it has more risks than investments in real estate, government bonds or the stock market and such people are not ready for adventures.  Among the best ways of investments in Bitcoin in 11 of the 15 countries of the world, people have chosen special websites. Respondents from Spain, France and Luxembourg rely on financial and banking consultants, while Italians say they consider both ways as equally important ones.  But not everything is so bad in Europe! Also, statistics showed that 70% of the leading companies supplying IT services to market infrastructure are preparing first blockchain projects. And this means that the future of crypto industry is definitely big!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Wow, friends, did you manage to live through yesterday? Do we have survivors after yesterday's match?!  We confess honestly, the FLOGmall team root for Russian team so strongly that we made each other cry. But it's worth it, guys, Russia WON in the match against Spain! And this is our common victory!  The match ended with the score - 1:1 (4:3 on penalties) and today is already Monday, but the country still idolizes Igor Akinfeev and adores the funny family in kokoshniks (traditional Russian headdress worn) which during match at the stadium "Luzhniki" appeared on the football screen eating pancakes. But these are all jokes, and we have one more serious issue with you.  We have again one winner! It proves that you should believe in your luck! According to the terms of our giveaway contest your bets should be regarding only the main and extra period of play, that is, an amazing penalty shoot-out was not counted, because the number of variations of possible scores could bring our user to madness. So, the man who believed that Russia will win and that the main score will be 1:1 is Alexander - and he is our winner!  Congratulations to the lucky guy, and all the participants we wish good luck in the next play! You have a lot of time before Saturday to overthink a new score!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: House of the rising cryptocurrency, or what The Animals would not dare to sing about    Trust to the cryptocurrency is growing every day. Recently you could not buy with BTC even a bottle of beer in the pub, but today people can buy houses with cryptocurrency. Meanwhile, in Russia, there is still no trust to digital currency, and some people consider it as really dangerous method of payment. Why is it so? Let's go deep into this question.  Cryptocurrency has a long-term successful history of development, it gathers recognition and love of people from all over the world. The growth of the trust level between the crypto enthusiast and the tokens will be evaluated by the fact whether these tokens will be chosen or not for making the transactions concerning a huge real estate or million dollars. We believe that this fact is very important.  The first official mentioning of buying a house with cryptocurrency was in Canada in spring 2013. A local resident decided to sell his father's house for 405 thousand dollars. At that time, the Bitcoin rate was $45, that means the owner got 9000 BTC. Now the Bitcoin rate is 6373$ per 1 BTC, and therefore one question arises to that owner: my friend, how do you feel? They say that at that moment, the Canadian owner of the house wanted to invest in some projects in the Internet. And we really hope that he did not invest and stored his BTC in order a bit to grow.  Another crypto enthusiast from Israel sold his villa in 2014 for 5000 Bitcoins, and, for sure, he does not feel bad either. So, one more question to the readers: why are we still afraid of buying an Iphone with cryptocurrency, if 5 years ago people began to use cryptocurrency without fear, registration procedure and SMS?  In the modern world, crypto experts believe that the US and Japan are the best real estate markets using cryptocurrency. But even in Russian minds, the notions "cryptocurrency" and "real estate" are not strange anymore. In June 2017, building company in Russia M9 Development said that it is ready to sell real estates with cryptocurrency.  By the way, what is this conversation about? Ask yourself a simple question: Are you ready to buy right now a house in the center of Moscow with digital currency? We have on alpha version couple of samples Half of you would give up, refusing from the adventures, but we do not ask you to sell your flat and paint the town red. Just imagine how easy could be the life with cryptocurrency in the future: simple process of buying a house, fast transactions, safe transactions, no inflated commissions.  And FLOGmall is approaching to this future. The first private crypto enthusiasts are ready to get rid of their real estates with the tokens right within the alpha version of our website. Our website gives you opportunity to buy or rent houses with cryptocurrency in any city of the world! By the way, on our alpha version there are private ads with houses in Belarus, villas in Turkey near the Black Sea, offices in Moscow and flats in the Russian villages. And the range of "crypto-residences" from all over the world is growing every day. Well, you see, it's cool to rent a house somewhere in Montenegro with cryptocurrency that you had since 2014?!  Trying to approach to transactions with cryptocurrencies, we come across not only the ambiguous positions of the authorities, but also some nuances that cause fear among market participants. But the market is developing so rapidly that it is not necessary to become a buyer for Bitcoin right now. It's just enough to think it over today (in a positive way) in order to participate in this market tomorrow.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  Yes, now we are developing ATES:  One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall's ICO from any other ICOs is the built-in automatic exchange of tokens, that is called ATES (Automatic token exchange service), FLOGmall to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site.  When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH.  After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: FLOgmall expands the horizons!  Friends, we are glad to inform you about important decision… We prolong our ICO for a while!  We reached Soft Cap, we met a lot of like-minded people, cool partners like KICKICO, Klooway, Viuly, we worked with such altcoins as Colossus, Cloakcoin, Solaris, Verge and started to popularize cryptocurrency but… If someone likes his job and he works hard, can he try to work perfectly? - yep!  June 26 should be the day when FLOGmall ICO will end. But we get an incredible amount of feedbacks from the people who don't have enough time, from our investors from Europe and the United States, who are currently solving the necessary legal issues in order to become participants of our project!  Why did we decide to do it?  Because of such interest in our project from Western investors, we just could not miss this opportunity. All our holders will get benefit from this.  On the website the contributions during the ICO stage are already $13,997,237, it means that the total amount during all stages is about $17,201,272. There is a chance to reach a total Hard-Cap - $24,000,000. So, should we give up right now?  Why is it so important? Reaching hard cap means an opportunity to improve the marketing strategy, and the right marketing strategy is our chance to popularize the world of cryptocurrency.  In our plans: the expansion of the community in Europe and the US, and we can achieve such results:  -More target audience → -More opportunities to develop the website → -More shops, goods and services → -More opportunities for MLC token on the exchange and ATES!  We announce a new day for the end of our ICO: July 20th!  This is the deadline for the end of FLOGmall ICO, nevertheless, there can be possibility of premature end of this stage, when our plans will be fulfilled.  The bonus system is still on, all bonuses will be the same till the very end. Also, we pay your attention that all plans concerning listing and sales are unchanged, and about each news FLOGmall will report personally!  We have worked really hard but we could not have done it alone! We thank our partners, investors, and, of course, the best bounty team who are so loyal and who every day promote our idea of cryptocurrency!  Thank you for being with us. Thank you for your support! We appreciate that you understand how important this decision is! The end of our ICO will be soon.  Stay with FLOGmall!
