Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  Smart contract with a secure transaction fixes the interaction of the seller and the customer, so only the person who made the purchase, would be able to leave feedback about the goods. The rating system allows you to evaluate the store on the basis of real statistics on 4 key indicators (the delivery time of the goods, the correspondence of the goods/ service description on the site to the obligations fulfilled, the price of the goods, the friendliness of the seller when communicating with the customer).  Secure purchases using a smart contract Listing the fee, the customer can be sure that it will go to the account of the seller only if the goods reach the destination point. As soon as the seller sends the goods, the customer receives a track code to track the shipment and can at any time see at which stage of delivery his/her order is. Based on the executed smart contract, the site automatically transfers funds to the seller's account only after the customer confirms the receipt of the goods and its proper quality. Otherwise, arbitration on this transaction will be opened.   Token is used for:  - buying services at the platform (the whole list you can see at the WP); - getting a cashback & discounts when buying goods for  MLC tokens;

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Successful token sale and how not to ruin the marketing of ICO: Let`s make it simple  According to the analysis made by Mofassir Hossein (investor, marketer and ICO-adviser, one of the world's leading experts in marketing and PR of ICO) nowadays 30-40 ICO are launched every day. 90% of them do not achieve the desired results. Many projects involve a lot of money and modern technologies, but they do not bring the success. Why is this happening? FLOGmall makes marketing of ICOs simple and clear!  You know that our project uses 79% of investments for a marketing campaign, and we are not the only one who understands that it is necessary. A lot of ICOs use the money for maintaining a high level of activity, but they do not get the desired effect. What to do? Let's first indicate the market opportunities, dividing them into chargeable and free. Let's start with the free one.  From our own experience, we can tell you that you need to create personal pages in all social networks. Now the society gets information only via the Internet. So, upload the information! Communicate with your user, have fun with him and share the news. It brings together. Our company has communities in almost all well-known social networks: Facebook, Vkontakte, Instagram, Telegram, Telegraph, Twitter, Medium, Reddit.  Next, start the bounty program and airdrop. It is a great way to attract new users desiring to get the tokens for free Translate the terms of participation of these programs into different languages, remember, your goal is not only your country but the whole world! Create as many unique contents as possible and give them to the participants of bounty program for sharing.  Pay attention to Telegram. Create a couple of chats: in the English language and in your own languages to communicate with people from different parts of the world. Pay extra attention to China and South Asia, because they are the Gods of sales.  Add your ICO to listing websites, many of them have the possibility of free publication.  In social networks, like Vkontakte and Facebook, it's easy to talk with admins of groups about the publication of interesting content about your project. Remember: you must be creative!  For sure, you visit different conferences in order to promote the idea of your project. Try during these conferences, especially during the private meetings, to negotiate with experts who are interested in you about the review of your project. And promote their reviews!  Fulfilling such simple instructions, you already get the minimal coverage that can bring the first investment. What to do then? Right! Use investments for the chargeable activities, that, for sure, are already "gathering dust in your marketing wardrobe".  Chargeable marketing has the MAIN role in your ICO, so do not get greedy if you want to achieve success in your promotion.  Chargeable marketing can mean anything. It can be publication in mass media, huge advertising campaign on TV, on the Internet, in shopping centers and airports. Of course, most experts and influencers will refuse to publish information about you for free. Therefore, for the famous celebrities, you have to pay.  Ah, yes, an important point! Do not forget how important it is to reach out to private investors. Because they are people with experience and therefore you need more private investors than admins of the community on Facebook. What exactly can be interesting for the potential holder of your tokens:  - Business plan and presentation (95% of ICOs do not have a clear business strategy and for this reason that they can not collect the necessary funds);  - Roadmap for the project;  - The structure of the token;  - Marketing analysis (and plans to promote your ICO or blockchain-startup);  - Simple white paper (with financial, marketing and perspective analysis);  - Onepager, that provides all the necessary information on one page;  - A good review about your project that will attract investors;  - ROI analysis.  If you have all of the mentioned above - congratulations! You can safely submit applications to venture and hedge funds! The most important is starting to launch the ICO make sure that you have all the necessary documents, that you carried out the necessary analysis and a clear strategy.  Why do we give away such useful information? Can our competitors use it? We believe that positive competition is a key to successful development of the whole market and the self-improvement of the project!  So, stay in touch with FLOGmall! See you!

Body: Get dressed! Free T-shirts with a unique printed image only at FLOGmall !  Summer! Sun! Heat! It's the very time to buy on our alpha version a cool summer hat, a swimming suit or a dress for your young girlfriend! Because you will get a cool T-shirt with a unique printed image as a gift from FLOGmall! Are you interested? Then let's go!  Right now the first samples of FLOGmall T-shirts were delivered to our office! Of course, we couldn't help ourselves and we tried them on. Look at us: stylish, fashionable, posh. It is such a pity that you can not touch them right now, because the fabric was chosen by our CEO himself!  Now 250 such T-shirts are preparing specially for FLOGmall and if you want to get one of them - follow these instruction. go to our alpha version https://alpha.flogmall.com/, buy any product that you need (it can be anything: a pair of socks or expensive car), and we`ll give you our T-shirt for free.  If you are one of those people who have everything, but you still want our T-shirt, you can just charge your wallet in personal account: https://crowdsale.flogmall.com/ Even 0.3 ETH will be enough, and we will send you a T-shirt from our project.  Printed image is very fancy, in FLOGmall colors: grey and yellow. It is simple and unusual at the same time. We claim that these FLOGmall T-shirts bring people who are interested in cryptocurrency together!  Such special offer will last till the end of June! You just purchase something and get dressed in FLOGmall style! It's time to get benefit, don't miss your chance!  ATTENTION, important information! Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Vincent van Gogh sold only 14 paintings for a song. In general, the painter wrote more than 2000 paintings, but during his lifetime no one paid enough attention to his work. Now the "Portrait of Dr. Gachet" by Vincent van Gogh could be sold at $ 150 million.  People first laughed at the Singer`s sewing machine. Now every part of it is patented, machines are used in mass production, and some people even write songs about them.  In 1919, the pioneer of rocket technology, Robert Goddard, described the idea of a multistage rocket and began talking about flights to the moon. The New York Times and the whole world laughed at him, and only 50 years later Neil Armstrong set foot on the Moon.  Why are we talking about it? History knows a lot of crazy ideas and their inspirers. And it knows even more people who did not believe in them so recklessly till the moment when their owners achieved success.  As you know, skeptics also often spoke about our project. A lot of people are waiting till the last to make sure that we do fail, they write to our support service, accusing that they did not have time to fulfil something. Friends, we have SPECIAL OFFER! Here and now we together begin to learn from other people's mistakes and stop making our own!  Today is the last day of the third bonus stage from FLOGmall! Now you can get from 5 to 10% of the benefits of the FLOGmall system! Manage it within 24 hours?! Possible, the advanced user of FLOGmall will need 24 seconds to catch his bonuses in time. Do you want the same? Then we repeat:  5-10 ETH = 5% 10-100 ETH = 7.5% 100 and more ETH = 10%  Well, isn't it difficult? Then go to the personal account, try it and see how your tokens grow.  Tomorrow, exactly at 14:00 (GTM+3), the third bonus stage from FLOGmall will be ended. Friends, we remind you that the ICO will not last forever! You have very little time left to go down in history with FLOGmall!  Remember that history is prone to be repeated! Catch you luck ASAP, until someone else takes it!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: A new partnership between FLOGmall and Klooway, or why does your phone ring the whole week?    Klooway is an international online platform for hosting ICO companies. Remember, not so long ago we told you about Alexey Khayrutdinov's trip about strategic issues to Moscow. This is just one of them. We have signed a legal agreement with the company, according to which Klooway is entitled to sell our tokens by their specialists.  Thus, now you can buy our tokens in three different ways: traditional one - in personal account of FLOGmall, proven one - KICKICO with bonuses from their platform, and new one - from Klooway with their benefits.  What is the convenience there? - you ask. Many beginners have problems with buying tokens. Someone can not understand the process of conversion of fiat money into the cryptocurrency, others have difficulties with wallets, while others are not cryptocurrency holders at all. Klooway kills these pains: there you can purchase cryptocurrency in any conceivable way, even with the help of Qiwi-purse or cash in their office.  By the way,apart from the given convenience, the guys provide the bonuses from their site. Having redeemed the right to sell quite a large number of MLC tokens, they can now give their customers good discounts. You can find out all the details on their personal communication channels, which we will publish below.  Therefore, if the phone rang suddenly - do not worry, take the phone and do not be shy, Klooway is now our official partner.  Telephones of specialists: +7 499 455 03 67; 8 800 551 69 02.  Mail: info@klooway.com  Address: Moscow, Presnenskaya embankment, 12, West part of the Federation tower, 43d floor.  Our page on the official website of the company:  https://klooway.com/campaign/82/flogmall  Clarify the questions if you are interested in, the company's employees will accompany you throughout your investment path.  And stay with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: The Scottish course of treatment for addiction to cryptocurrency:  Neuro-linguistic programming or electric shock?    Are you crazy about cryptocurrency? If someone whispers "blockchain" nearby, do you slowly get the goosebumps going? When you wake up, do you first of all check the rate of BTC and ETH? Congratulations, you have addiction to cryptocurrency! And the text below is for you!  At the Castle Craig clinic in the south of Scotland, scientists created a treatment course for addiction to cryptocurrency. Scientists have identified a new type of mental disorder with the help of polls.  According to the experts studying the addiction to cryptocurrency, trading of digital currency turns into a disease just when you begin to monitor the slightest fluctuations of your virtual investments uncontrollably.  "Castle Craig provides treatment to people who are keen on day-trading, trading of cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple and Litecoin. We consider this as a form of gambling, "- says the website of the clinic. Why these tokens are considered as especially dangerous - is not known yet.  Among the symptoms of addiction to cryptocurrency, scientists include muscle tension, anxiety, constant monitoring of prices of digital assets (at night as well), thoughts about trading or other actions.  "For some people, trading in cryptocurrency is becoming a way to escape to another world, because the world in which they live, they do not like," says clinic doctor Tony Marini.  In the rehabilitation center, "cryptocurrency  abusers" work in groups where they tell their stories and with the help of specialists try to get rid of their addiction. According to experts, every tenth trader from the US is addicted to cryptocurrency.  Many countries are really engaged in studying the issue of addiction to cryptocurrency. South Korea, for example, is one of the countries where the addiction to cryptocurrency causes serious fears of the authorities and may become a reason for the rigid regulation of the digital currency market. Russia also belongs to a number of countries that paid attention to the new human disease. In Moscow, a free service of psychological support has already been launched for miners and cryptocurrency investors.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Friends! We, as well as all Russian ICO, have our patriotism and just can not close our eyes to such an important event for our country. Moreover, it has already involved already 80% of the globe. Well, of course, we are talking about the World Cup 2018, which started on June 14 in our RUSSIAN land! Who roots for, comrades?  Are you a real fan who knows all the sport cheers and you have since childhood talent of predicting the outcome of matches  or you are just an occasional spectator? So, it's time to compete with your luck at FLOGmall!  We start CONTEST, where everyone can participate, without exception! Even if you came here exactly five minutes ago and do not know anything about cryptocurrencies - you're already in business! On 19th of June at 21:00 (GTM+3) will be a match in which Russia and Egypt will meet. Having foreseen the outcome of which, you can get $1600 in FLOGmall tokens called MLC tokens!  The terms of participation are simple:  1. Fill in the form with the score of the match: https://goo.gl/aTa9aa 2. Share this post : https://goo.gl/or7cou 3. Root for your team and wait for the results of the contest  The rules:  1. One sharing- one participant 2. The post should not be removed until the end of the contest 3. Among the participants who guessed the correct score of the match, one winner will be selected randomly, who will receive $1600 in the equivalent of our tokens! 4. The results of the contest will be announced on June 20.  Attract as many friends as possible, try different combinations, win TOGETHER! FLOGmall begins to take your predictions right now!  And may the odds be ever in your favor!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: What is the outcome of partnerships when it comes to FLOGmall?    FLOGmall was not built immediately. And now you can notice quite diverse range of products on the site, but once the first one to entrust us with its product was Jumo. Who is this Jumo? This is the first store that believed in our site. The guys make premium cases for your smartphones (Iphone, Samsung), covers for passports and other documents. And they make them as high quality as possible.  For its product, the Jumo team uses only the best materials: carbon, titanium, steel, glass, exotic natural leather, stabilized wood, marble, epoxy resins and precious metals.  Not long ago, we found a partner, another promising beginner altcoin Colossus. We had a fruitful cooperation with the guys, and we decided to combine business with pleasure. And they introduced some of their comrades to others.  Colossus presented unique case from Jumo with the logo of its token. The guys were very pleased with such a friendly presentation and took many cases from the limited crypto collection for their partners. If you want the same cool case made of python, titanium, centaur, or other mythological creature, just click on the link: https://alpha.flogmall.com/shop/5a8ea633312f917cc9e8fe54/  Bring joy to your inner little miner, choose Jumo!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: FLOGmall in the Federation Council: what the crypto industry promised the state  The FLOGmall team is reaching a new level! Now we are conquering with our minds and charm the Parliament of the Russian Federation. How Maxim Teleshev with our partner Arthur Lipatov took out the project to public - read below!  Last week on June 7 in the capital of our homeland, Moscow, the International Blockchain Conference took place in the Federation Council. Among the invited persons at the event were members of the Federation Council, State Duma deputies, Governors and Vice Governors of the regions of the Russian Federation, heads of large companies, representatives of commercial banks, and experts in crypto business. It is a great event for the domestic crypto industry, at which the next successful performance of the FLOGmall team took place.  In March of this year, there were bills brought into legislation in the State Duma, regulating the market of cryptocurrencies, ICO and crowd-funding, as well as concepts that define ideas about digital law, digital money and other segments of crypto economics. At the last conference legislative initiatives on legal regulation and predicted the progress of building a digital economy in Russia were just discussed.  The event of this format takes place in our country for the first time, but today it describes itself as one of the authoritative discussion platforms for discussing crypto politics and the results of its enforcement in the Russian Federation. Results and proposals made within the framework of the event are planned to be systematized and presented to the authorities, participants of the crypto community and descendants for the future. As you can guess, the conference was so successful that the organizers decided to carry out an annual event.  Among the speakers, one could meet modern crypto-celebrities: Juvan Lee, organizer of Fintech Week, as well as CEO of NexChange and of Venture Fund - Arrakis Ventures; Pushkov Anton, Managing Partner of the Intellectual Property Center of the Skolkovo Foundation; Sidorenko Elina, the head of the group on assessing the risks of turnover of cryptocurrency in the State Duma of the Russian Federation; Karl Eckstein, Professor, Doctor of Law, Honorary Consul of the Russian Federation in Switzerland.  By the way, Djuvan Li and a member of our team Maxim Teleshev talked for about an hour and a half. He told us about the secrets of holding the ICO in the Asian countries, revealed a couple of secrets that will later help us in our future Road Show.  As part of the presentation of projects, Arthur Lipatov introduced us from the stage, if anyone forgot - he is the charming community director of FLOGmall, as well as the father of the Russian Silicon Valley, our partner. Some of the residents of the Silicon Valley also showed their achievements in the exposition sphere.  And although we had some problems with the transportation and installation of a two-meter high plasma, it was a positive experience that brought to us such fruits as 50+ handed out business cards to interested enthusiasts, new acquaintances and agreements with investment funds, and most important - the admiring eyes of the public, which found out that our security token (which is not often found in the domestic ICO), and that in general someone is doing such suitable projects in the Russian countryside.  It was a productive meeting, one of those after which you get tired in a good way so that you miss the after-party ("But please do not write about this" - Maxim Teleshev )  Follow the further trips of our team, we have plans to conquer the whole world! And stay with FLOGmall!

Chats will be improved between the seller and the buyer! Communication will be much easier! The guys are also developing the statuses of the goods. In Avito's manner. Usual options - pending, published, rejected.  Great edits in platform design are expected too. Switching the pictures, specifying the price of order (either ascending or descending), adding to favorites, viewed products. The new design waits for the tab "Orders", for a more comfortable view.  In tabs with goods are also planned small changes. For example, you can ask seller a question about his product and view the history of purchases. That is, the amount of purchased goods will be displayed directly next to the product.  ---------------------------------------  The post of the new updates will appear very soon

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: It's our key advantage and difference from any other ICOs. It's the built-in automatic exchange of tokens, that is called ATES (Automatic token exchange service), FLOGmall to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site.  When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH, which is higher than the selling of MLC tokens on the pre-ICO and ICO stages.  After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Few words about security or a new kind of deal on FLOGmall In Hogwarts was Dumbledore, King Arthur had Merlin, Stalin had Wolf Messing, the United States was conquered by Copperfield, and now FLOGmall got his wizards. Not so long ago on Hakaton in Skolkovo we got acquainted with a cool team of developers. The guys achieved the second place there within the largest forum for specialists from different areas of software, and then joined our team of blockchain engineers. It was their help that our team wrote for you a working prototype of a secure transaction on the Ethereum protocol using Metamask. Why Metamask? Because it is a convenient and easy-to-use cryptocurrency wallet for fast Internet payments and the storage of ETH and derivative tokens. Everything works very simply. You install a plug-in for the Chrome browser for quick payments and transactions within the Ethereum network and for work with cryptocurrency exchanges, and without any complications you use the benefits of our safe transaction. This application in our case kills absolutely all headaches. FLOGmall with Metamask can identify the user. In simple words, this is our guarantee that you are you, your payment is your payment, and it refers to a specific order. Prototype of a safe transaction, of course, is not finished completely, but it is already fully functioning. And very soon it will be published on our site. At the moment, we are putting in order the external appearance of the transaction and we`re transferring the currency into USDT. USDT is the fixation of the actual value of the cryptocurrency in dollars. That is, the rate of your token remains the same as it was at the time of the closure of the transaction and will not be changed. If for the seller the currency is immediately converted into USDT, and if it goes to him even for a maximum period of 40 days, then no matter how the rate will be jumping during this time, he will receive his amount in an unchanged state. Very soon, friends, we will represent this device officially! This is a work of a great scale, and we did it together. Because FLOGmall cares about the security of your tokens!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: What is the result of work with cryptocurrency exchanges, or how Cryptorg.net appeared on FLOGmall  Look at yourself in the mirror. Do you see a trader there? Then our news will definitely bring you joy, pleasure and profit in addition.  While we were taming the next dragon of cryptocurrency exchanges, and this, as you understand - the fundamental layer of work; during the process of implementation of our plans we have met with the guys from Cryptorg.  Site Cryptorg.net was published not so long ago, but it has gained its users. It is a bot for automatic tradings on cryptocurrency exchanges. They have rather an interesting format, convenient and pleasant interface, a minimum of settings and a conservative "averaging strategy." And if you are a trader who has not heard about it yet, we advise you to get acquainted with it. If you are a beginner trader, then you do need it, the guys give to their new users free advice on setting up the bot.  The site already cooperates with the coolest world exchanges, now you can see them in the list of our partners as well! Our token, in its turn, will add to the bot. Therefore, if you have been planning for a long time, how to make money on MLC, then Cryptorg will help you!  In general, welcome, friends!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: You asked, FLOGmall performed: "cold" wallets are already on sale!    Of course, personal accounts on FLOGmall are safe. What can not be said about MyEtherWallet or Bitcoin-wallet. The safety of your cryptocurrency has never been as important as it is today. Fortunately, there are already many companies which are ready to vouch for the safety of your investments. Two products that can be identified in today's market as the best guards are Ledger and Trezor.  Recently we published an introductory post about hardware wallets, the published under the post survey showed your interest in having them on our site. And since we - your Fairy Godmother and Santa Claus in one person, we have granted one more your wish!  Now Ledger and Trezor can be found on the FLOGmall Store with the most attractive price: only here they are sold at a cost price!  Just for our love for each user, we can not deprive you of the next bonuses this time as well. Only until the end of this week you will receive a hardware wallet absolutely for free. Well, is that interesting? Then let's talk about the details!   And if you deposit from 5 ETH and more until 10 June, then in addition to the benefits of the bonus system, you will also receive Ledger as a gift! In order you could even more securely hide the money earned with FLOGmall. Next week, the offer loses its magic power, so if you care about the security of your tokens as well as Gollum about the Ring, we advise you to hurry up!   Keep the tokens "cold", dear crypto enthusiasts!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Do you have "Experience points"? Now you can spend Experience points on FLOGmall!  We welcome a new altcoin on the site! Experience Points. Let's talk about it.  Experience Points (XP) desires to popularize the technology of using cryptocurrency among players in online games. Experience Points (XP) is bridging the gap between the cryptocurrency world of 3-5 million users, and the 1.2 billion gamers (potential candidates - cryptocurrency holders) worldwide through an innovative Proof-of-Stake reward system and an aggressive marketing and expansion plan.  Cryptocurrency Experience Points is a digital coin that can be used as a payment method for buying goods in online games and in real online stores. Initially XP - was created as a reward for cyber sportsmen. To earn it is easy: by completing challenges,  by accomplishing certain activities such as unlocking achievements, completing levels and finishing the game.  Cryptocurrency is absolutely anonymous (without unpleasant surprises), the speed of transactions is very fast. The maximum emission is 266,116,933,498 XP.  XP was launched in 2006 and since that moment it has achieved great success. Now it is one of the main coins in the field of online games. The working on the project team in 2018 is going to get a big breakthrough, negotiations are already on with the developers of the most popular games. If they are successful, the Experience Points will be able to reach $ 1 per piece. By the way, now one token can be bought at a price of $ 0.000150 per piece.  At the CoinExchange stock market, the daily volume of trades is 35 million dollars. Given the overall capitalization of the project, we can say that this is a very weak indicator. And it means that the increase in the value of the token can be prolonged.  If you play any kind of online games, then you just have to buy Experience Points. And there are three reasons for this. First, the value of this token is ridiculous (man, that's less than one cent), second, these tokens in the near future can be used for purchases inside the most popular video games.  Third - you can profitably spend them on FLOGmall. Buy a new Macbook Pro, for example, which will support all the latest updates of the video games. Your cyber-enemies will surrender just having heard about such news.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall's ICO from any other ICOs is the built-in automatic exchange of tokens, that is called ATES (Automatic token exchange service), FLOGmall to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site.  When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH, which is higher than the selling of MLC tokens on the pre-ICO and ICO stages.  After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Do you still rely on MEW? Then we go to you! Two hardware wallets, from the "freeze" which you just can not refuse    Everyone can buy branded MLC tokens of  FLOGmall: they are in the public domain and are ready to be yours with a pleasant price. It is more difficult to earn your own currency. You need to buy expensive mining equipment, cheap and almost endless electricity, stress tolerance and patience. And to lose cryptocurrency is possible within a second. You even blink twice slowly  Not so long ago, at the beginning of May, one news drove thousands of cryptocurrency holders crazy: more than 150 thousand MyEtherWallets were hacked. Actually, MEW repeatedly have viruses or malware. What to do? Get Ledger and Trezor, what else.  These are hardware, so-called "cold" wallets. Both products have received a great respect from the cryptocurrency community for the safety, peace and good sleep that they provide to their holders. In fact, they do not store currencies on their own. Physical equipment acts as the protection of private information and data that is used to access to digital assets.  In general, the hardware wallet is just an extra level of security in case you are protected only by an expired antivirus. They will prevent fraud, fishing and will not let anyone use your secret keys and words.  If your hardware wallet is suddenly damaged or lost, you can easily restore it using the list of "code words" that you create setting up the device and writing to the attached cards.  Hardware wallets maintain almost all top cryptocurrencies, and also constantly have pleasant and convenient updates.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Why does Alexei Khayrutdinov lure users to the Federation Tower, and what has happened to the buyer who purchased Ipad on FLOGmall  FLOGmall - a young platform that has just started its voyage through the sea of the crypto industry.  Not so long ago on our platform, a user from Moscow ordered a brand new Ipad 512 GB spacegray. And there was a delay in delivery. This is not a very pleasant coincidence, when exactly this color, size and RAM of the gadget was not at the right time in our storehouse.  But we were lucky. Aleksei Khayrutdinov, who was by chance in Moscow, solving strategic issues, decided personally to organize delivery to the buyer. Alexei had a business meeting in the Federation Tower, therefore, it was decided to transmit Ipad there, not leaving the spectacular panorama of Moscow City. In general, Alexey and Maxim handed Ipad personally from the hands of the founders with video shooting, fanfares and other flavors.  In this photo - the image of a real person who already uses all the benefits of FLOGmall and spends his cryptocurrency. Meet Gennady. Gennady already uses Ipad, purchased for a real Ethereum and he is already thinking about buying a Macbook. Ipad was given to our user by CEO FLOGmall Alexei Khayrutdinov, and also he granted a bonus in the form of cashback 20% of the purchase for the prolonged expectation.  In addition to the delivery of the goods, we also talked about the importance of the project, the development of the cryptocurrency and even predicted the future that awaits us all. Very soon our new episode "How We Do ICO" will be released on Youtube, in which we included this interview. Soon you will see everything by yourself, and there is also a beautiful panorama of Moscow City - as a bonus.   And remember, next time everyone could be such Gennady, yes, yes, EVERYONE, who reads this text. So, do not miss your chance!  Go to FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How ends the cryptoparty with FLOGmall? We came back from Moscow  Hey guys! Recently we`ve told you about the cool crypto conferences that our founders went to conquer. Alexandr Zalogin was left by the fate in hot Krasnodar city at the party organized by the Youtube channel called Vlogchain, and Alexei Khayrutdinov was waiting for a long flight to Moscow, where he had to meet real sharks of the capital's trading. What is it for - read below!  The cryptoparty was amazing. And not only due to entertainment show and funny DJs, but also due to heated discussions and intensive brainstorming. But for those who are fans of their work - even evening rest during day off is slowly flowing into a fruitful action. "We solved the business cases, shared knowledges, smoked hookah" (c) Alexander Zalogin.   Now we move to Moscow.  To begin with, the Platinum meeting in Moscow was like clockwork. For the performance, we were provided with 10 minutes, in which to fit in, was as difficult as to put on tights over the head. Almost impossible.  To tell and to show from all sides the project of such scale for a short time - unreal. Therefore, Alexei had to take another five minutes, skip the most interesting graphics from the presentation, wind up the organizers` clock at 5 minutes later. Despite all this, speech turned out to be lively and interesting. A brief summary about the participation in the project, possible benefits and how to make profit  (information already known by each of our readers), as well as a promotional code + 50%, were received by 150 conference participants that day.  This is why our CEO was caught in the lobby, on the stairs, and at the exit from the conference hall, in order to clarify the issues of investment as fully as possible and to join the project. And ten-minute performance at 13:00 was stretched to the evening party by hands of the capital audience.  We brought a big suitcase of events from Moscow (besides traditional souvenirs and lack of sleep). But one thing at a time: about the results of the trip we will tell gradually in all official sources of communication. Follow our news!  We meet in the next post!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: And again, the analyst: we explore the interest in cryptocurrencies in different parts of the world    Recently we came across an interesting study, during which it became clear that in countries with the largest cryptocurrency markets, one in four does not know about cryptocurrency at all. If you forgot for a second, in what age we live with you - in the 21st. How did it happen that people in the world of technological progress, where they speak about the cryptocurrency from every source, do not know about its existence yet? Read below!  Not so long ago, Dalia Research company conducted a study of interest in cryptocurrencies in different countries of the world. The team evaluated the knowledge of local residents about the crypto industry, as well as their willingness to acquire and own digital assets.  The survey involved about 29 thousand respondents from different parts of the world - the United States, Britain, Germany, Brazil, Japan, South Korea, China and India.  75% of the respondents "heard something" about the cryptocurrencies. Population of Japan and South Korea are best acquainted with digital assets - 83% and 87%, the lowest numbers - in Brazil, 60%. Yes, the vast majority, but what to do with those who are still out of the loop?  Only half of these 75% of people who heard about cryptocurrency knows what cryptocurrency really is,they know that it is not a tricky fraud of ICO-founders , and the term "farms" have nothing to do with cows and goats. And again, the highest levels of awareness go to Japan and South Korea.  After the prices for cryptocurrencies go up and down like McGregor on the warm-up, then reaching a peak, then again falling to the economic bottom, the researchers asked the question: is anyone going to invest in the cryptocurrency after all this? It turned out that from half of 75%, about 4% of respondents want to buy digital assets. On average, this figures for different countries ranged from 3 to 6%. These data, especially in comparison with high levels of awareness about the digital assets market as a whole, show that the cryptocurrencies are still at the early stage of their adoption time.  By the way, 7% of all respondents are lucky owners of different tokens.  Researchers worked hard and even divided the interviewed group into categories of education, fields of activity and gender. Discarding all gender stereotypes, we claim: you can meet a man-cryptocurrency holder more often than woman! The difference in the sex distribution of owners of cryptocurrencies is 11%.  It is interesting that respondents with a higher level of education are more likely to own cryptocurrencies. There are more owners of digital assets who have higher education by 12%.  Such results, friends.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  A distinctive feature of Mallcoin entry to the exchange is that the rate of this cryptocurrency will already be provided with the current exchange rate at ATES and will have its lower level, which tends to the rate of the most profitable offer at ATES on the day of Mallcoin entry to the exchange.  It will vary within the range from 0.0001666666667 to 0.001 Ethereum. According to the laws of supply and demand for tokens, at the first stage the rate will quickly equalize with respect to the ATES rate (price smoothing).  If the average rate of the MLC token on all exchanges is higher than at ATES, then there will be a complete (partial) repurchase of tokens at ATES as a result of space arbitrage. The official rate on ATES will then have the average exchange value of the MLC token value.  If the rate on the exchanges is lower than at ATES, it will not incur a loss of investment for investors, as they will be able to exchange tokens at a fixed rate of ATES.  It is also worth saying that the demand for the purchase and sale of MLC tokens on exchanges does not directly depend on the demand of users of the FLOGmall system, but is market-based, so Mallcoin's exchange rate can significantly exceed the official FLOGmall exchange rate.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Till the end of 2018 energy costs for mining of Bitcoin will be 0.5% of global consumption  Mining of Bitcoin will consume 0.5% of the world's energy before the end of 2018! Such disappointing results were provided by economist Alex de Fris.  According to the expert, at the present time the BTC network consumes about 2.55 GW of electricity, but by the end of 2018 it will surely reach the mark of 7.67 GW. For example, the population of Ireland consumes 3.1 GW, and Austria - 8.2 GW.  Do you feel the scale of energy consumption? Now wonder that the discussion about how much mining of cryptocurrency harms the environment every day only gets hot.  Let's try to consider the situation from the other side. Imagine how cryptocurrency is in demand, if a person is willing to spend such amount of energy resources, knowing that thereby destroys the planet. Just think how much cryptocurrency is becoming desirable for us, if we are ready to harm to the environment.  But what's the point of spending an immense amount of electricity to convert the cryptocurrency into fiat money with huge commissions and tax deductions?  As you already know, FLOGmall decides not only the issue with the unrealized cryptocurrency but gives a chance to spend it with benefit. It also gives you the opportunity to earn cryptocurrency inside the site without a harmful mining.  For this you have several ways:  Take advantage of our bonus system; Buy MLC before listing of token on stock exchanges; Wait for the release of the unique service ATES on the site. Our global human task is to save the environment, so if there is a choice between spending money on electricity or buying tokens, choose the second one!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: SCN Corporate Connect published an interview with FLOGmall  As you remember, a few days ago our Chief business development officer, Germogen Korolev, visited the Marketsite, TV studio of one of the leading foreign stock exchanges called NASDAQ in order to tell the western audience about FLOGmall. SCN Corporate Connect published the interview, conducted by hostess Jane King, where she revealed even the smallest details of our project, which, perhaps, were still not even known by our most loyal followers. And now you can get acquainted with the video personally.  At Times Square Germogen Korolev told about the secrets of the monetization process on the site, the global goals of the project, the financing of the platform, he disclosed information about preSale, pre-ICO and ICO stages, and he also lifted the veil of secrecy of our charitable project Real.help. Below you can find link to this interview and watch it with your own eyes.  Thank you for staying in touch with us!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  For example, when speaking about return of a product. While at the legislative level, this issue is not settled, of course a return under the law on consumer protection is impossible. As well as it is not possible to purchase it on any international site, such as eBay or aliexpress. The issue of goods of good quality is regulated by a safe transaction.  If the product is defective or damaged, you can provide evidence of this fact according to our instructions, and you can directly contact the store for an exchange or refund. Since the store has a rating and reviews, it is important for them to monitor their reputation, and they are likely to solve the issue in your favor. If this does not happen, then you can contact the support service of the platform. And according to the instructions, we will resolve this issue. We do not want any of the parties to the transaction to violate the laws of the jurisdiction in which they operate. If you have purchased a product with the service "safe transaction", in this case you have protected yourself 100% from such situations.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  It can be guaranteed with secure purchases using a smart contract.  Listing the fee, the customer can be sure that it will go to the account of the seller only if the goods reach the destination point. As soon as the seller sends the goods, the customer receives a track code to track the shipment and can at any time see at which stage of delivery his/her order is.  Based on the executed smart contract, the site automatically transfers funds to the seller's account only after the customer confirms the receipt of the goods and its proper quality. Otherwise, arbitration on this transaction will be opened.  In this case, the customer will be motivated to close the transaction due to the fact that he will receive an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and rating as a user of the site.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: From general to specific. How deals are made at FLOGmall    The first private ads appeared in Ancient Egypt, when an Egyptian was looking for an escaped slave. The first prototypes of the bulletin boards appeared in Western newspapers in the middle of the twentieth century. It was already clearly structured with headings of ads: cars, real estate, furniture. Meanwhile, FLOGmall approached to the anniversary of 3000 publications!  We have 3091 private ads. Thousands of sellers have already found their buyer at FLOGmall and signed the first official deals in history for cryptocurrency. And all is within our site!  In the column of private ads, the success of a deal depends not only on the popular price-quality ratio, but also on trust. At the moment, the FLOGmall team is working on the concept of security and moderation. But we are talking only about alpha version of the site.You will have to contact the seller personally.  Perhaps you will ask why more and more people come to us every day with their "stuff"? Because this is still the most convenient way to earn cryptocurrency, bypassing mining and the theft of public electricity. You can sell any unnecessary thing and get real cryptocurrency for it, which you will use in the right way.  And so FLOGmall solves two problems: painless earnings for any user and attracting new users. Because, although we live in the age of cryptocurrency technologies, the cryptocurrency for many people still does not have significance, as for us. Surprisingly, we know! And if our idea that you can not only buy Bitcoin, but also earn it using your "stuff" will be understood by at least one user, he is already involved. Definitely!  It works almost as simply as the FLOGmall bonuses. Try, you will not regret!  See you at Alpha!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: The condition of the crypto industry in the whole world... Is it stable?    Blockchain tries to rid the world of greedy IT companies, Bitcoin ignores Wall Street offers and fights with Bitcoin Cash, the Ukrainian ICO market has grown by 90% ...  And, in the meantime, the Russian legislation will not still figure out the questions of regulation of the cryptocurrency business. And although it is already possible to pay with cryptocurrency inside commercial Internet sites, even in some restaurants this method of payment is considered as unofficial one and it is not protected by the state. Moreover, by banks it is still considered as dangerous, provoking criminal activity and aiding terrorism.  Is everything so bad in the rest global economic powers? Let's figure it out.  Firstly we'll note that along with Russia, such countries as India, South Korea, Australia and France plan to draft law on the regulation of cryptocurrencies. Japan, Hong Kong, Singapore, China, USA, Canada, Brazil, Britain, Germany deny the need to regulate the cryptocurrencies. Why is it happening? Because of lack of necessity.  For example, in China cryptocurrency exchanges and ICO - are banned completely and irrevocably. South Korea also banned the ICO, but its cryptocurrency exchanges are on the contrary, thriving in "gray zone". The "gray zone" means illegal business and, by the way, such business is very popular in all Asia, Europe, North and South America, Australia and Russia. And they seem to be happy with it. Well, only Japan has officially allowed the existence of cryptocurrency exchanges at its territory yet.  The only sphere left now without repression is payment with the cryptocurrency and the convertation of cryptocurrency into fiat money. Payments with cryptocurrency are allowed almost everywhere, that means that FLOGmall is your best solution in this case. Because we have no limitations for you. And we are not even talking about your investments. You can exchange your cryptocurrency for any commodity of everyday use and vice versa, a thing that has long been collecting dust in the wardrobe- for the Bitcoin, Ethereum, or any other cryptocurrency.  You forget about unnecessary gestures: do not convert cryptocurrency into fiat, stop attending exchanges with their boring charts, and just buy at the site with the cryptocurrency in the form that is stored on your cryptocurrency wallet.  On average, the purchase on FLOGmall takes 2 minutes 24 seconds. What can not be said about the choice ... Because the range of goods is growing and changing every day. Hey, what are we talking about. Go to the site and make sure everything in person!  See you at FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  The price will be 0.001ETH. Speaking about the ATES:   The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site.  When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH, which is higher than the selling of MLC tokens on the pre-ICO and ICO stages.  After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello. Now the world's major platforms such as ebay, amazon and alibaba and others will not be able to: 1)exchange cryptocurrency for Fiat money; 2)calculate the tax base and pay taxes 3)carry out commercial activities using cryptocurrency in prohibited jurisdictions.     Even if over time, some jurisdictions will determine the legal status of individual large cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin and ethereum, the other, smaller cryptocurrencies, which exist more than 1000 types will remain outside the legal field. At the moment, the audience of crypto-holders, although growing at a high pace, is still insignificant in terms of all users of the e-commerce market. That is why the introduction of additional payment methods for goods and services is not yet strategically important for the giants of the industry.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Facebook conquers the blockchain. But what about the ban?    Not so long ago social networks boycotted the ICOs, banned advertising of projects, and the words "token", "blockchain" and "altcoin" were described as abusive language. We have already begun to pack suitcases and to say good-bye to facebook, twitter and other foreign social networks, but suddenly the funny news was published. Perhaps this is a door to a bright future, or maybe a way to "hype on actual topics".  In general, Facebook announced the creation of the team that will study the field of blockchain. The initiative group was headed by David Marcus, who is vice president of Messenger. (By the way, previously Marcus hold an office as president of PayPal)  "After almost four incredible years in Messenger, I decided it was time to take on a new challenge. I'm creating a small group to find out how you can apply blockchain  technology to Facebook." Recorde says that the team will bring together at least a dozen of specialists, developers and reproductive scientists from the Instagram unit. This is the first such a serious step in working with blockchain technology.  Previously, Markus said that Facebook Messenger will be open for the cryptocurrency payments immediately after the blockchain community "will fix all the problems." Because during the ban on advertising of ICOs Facebook described this area as a "compartment for fraudulent projects."  Perhaps Marcus and his team could put things in order in the messy blocks of the blockchain? Guess we'll see.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  A live store is a collection of video content and blogs about sellers, stores, goods and services:  1.Video presentation of the store  Show your store/office/production and increase the trust index in your business and in what you do. Do you have a nice and beautiful ShowRoom, on the interior of which you worked so hard? Shoot a short video for everybody to know about it! 2.Video message of the store owner to the audience  Declare yourself to the whole world! Tell your clients about your company , the unique services, and products offered. Make millions of users fall in love with your business! 3.Video ads for each product/service  Accompany your announcement with short videos that announce your product better than any words and inspiring the customer to place an order. 4.Video blog for reporting on important events and promotions  Do/have you have/had an important event that you want to share? Do it in the usual format of social networking services, accompanying the text with photo and video materials. Clients from all over the world will be able to follow you, and newcomers will be more loyal to your store when choosing amongst competitors. 5.Online video sales (streaming), video auctions, game models  Arrange video sales of goods in real time through streaming video. This type of video nowadays is rapidly gaining steam, and in the coming years a huge outbreak in this industry is expected. 6.Video ads on the platform  Present your brand or product through video advertising directly on our platform. Promote your live store or specific product to millions of users from around the world and immediately convert them into sales through video advertising.  Each video uploaded to FLOGmall is automatically protected by a watermark. This video is much more difficult to steal and remake than traditional photo-content and text descriptions of goods.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  We had an article not long about these theme:  Why are people still afraid of online-shopping despite such figures? We conducted a survey among our users and the most popular answers to the question are:  Fear like "expectation-reality"; when the reality has not borne out the expectations. Unwillingness to pay for shipping; Fear of an advance payment, or even the whole amount of payment to an unknown person and to be duped. To give money personally to the seller-consultant is somehow safer; Desire to get at least some guarantee documents, but .... The last point, as it turned out, is the most important. Therefore, let's talk about it. How to be assured that your purchase will reach you safe and sound, or at least it will be just delivered to you. Without the call to a lawyer and other legal persons  To protect the interests of buyers from fraud, on our site there is a service called  "Safe transaction", within which FLOGmall acts as a kind of arbitrator. The transaction is done with the help of smart-contract and MLC tokens.  Making a purchase using Safe transaction, the seller receives payment only after the goods are received by the buyer. That is, until your order is on the doorstep of your house, and you do not confirm it personally, the seller will not get your money. Otherwise, you have the right to open dispute about this transaction.  As soon as the seller sends the goods, the buyer receives a track code to track the shipment and can control at any time at which stage of delivery his order is.  What will happen if the buyer wants to "dump" the seller? Buyer will not want it, because he will be motivated to close the deal in order to get an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and a positive rating as a site user.  The most curious people will ask: What other advantages does smart-contract have? Only using smart-contract you can get the most truthful information about each seller. Smart-contract records all the nuances of the seller-buyer relationship, therefore, only the person who actually made the purchase would be able to leave a feedback about the product. So you avoid thousands of sweet but fake feedbacks and reviews.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: What is ERC-20? Seven commandments which you don`t know    Do you know that MLC tokens are tokens of ERC-20 standard? No? Well, now you know. If for you this abbreviation is completely new and means nothing, then start reading the text below! Go!    What is ERC-20, and why haven't you heard anything about it? Most of ICOs use the Ethereum network as a platform or, more precisely, the smart- contracts of this network. During fundraising campaigns, organizers of ICO usually accept ETH or BTC as payment, charging investors with tokens instead. More often these are tokens of ERC-20 standard, as in the case with FLOGmall.    What does these three letters imply? ERC (Ethereum Request for Comments) is an official protocol using which you can make suggestions for improving of Ethereum. Number "20" means the identification number. That is, the tokens of the ERC-20 standard are actually smart-contracts on the Ethereum blockchain.  The ERC-20 standard has a set of rules that you should follow in order for a token to be accepted and to be able to interact with other tokens on the network. The tokens themselves are blockchain-assets, which can have value, and can be sent and received like any other cryptocurrency.    Why did you need to create ERC-20? Before this standard, there were some problems of incompatibility between different forms of Ethereum tokens. Because each of them hides its own unique smart-contract. Ultimately, for a stock exchange or a wallet to support a token without problems (by the way supporting of a growing number of tokens did not become problematic) it was necessary to create a new unified protocol.    What is the difference between the ERC-20 tokens and the traditional cryptocurrency? Here everything is quite simple. The difference is that they are tied with the Ethereum network, they use the format of addresses accepted within this network and are sent using Ethereum-transactions. Accordingly, transactions involving ERC-20 tokens can be tracked in the block browser.  It is important to understand that the ERC-20 tokens are not completely independent as it was mentioned above, they are based on the Ethereum blockchain, on the distributed computing capabilities of which they rely in their work.    Why were ERC-20 tokens created, and who would need them? They can be not only a cryptocurrency in the standard sense, but they also act as project shares, certificates that confirm the right to assets or points in the loyalty program. Well, of course to fulfill all these functions at once. Among the most famous tokens based on the ERC-20 standard are 0x, Aragon, Dentacoin, EOS, Civic, BAT, Kucoin, TenX, TTron and Mallcoin for sure.  Well, did you figure it out? Now you can say that you are an expert in ERC standards. Stay with us, we will continue to sort out all your questions!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hi, I'm Dasha, and I'm a copywriter of FLOGmall! It is not a S.O.S signal, not signal for help, programmers do not beat me or close me with key in the office. Our developers promised to update the alpha version this week, but they haven't done it...  Don't be angry with them, they did not rest and did not play computer games at work. Just at the present moment more global tasks are next-up-and-coming. What kind of?  The guys are completing a number of tasks for improving the platform, and also add to it new devices that will make the life of the user of FLOGmall even easier and with more fun. For example, our developers are designing now a list of similar offers. That is, if you are looking for a cover for your gadget, at the bottom of the page you will find a number of variants that meet your requirements.  Filters in catalogue. What does it mean? It means that now you do not need to scroll through the pages with rows of clothes, looking for your seize, you just type in the right numbers, and here you are! Choose!  Chats will be improved between the seller and the buyer! Communication will be much easier! The guys are also developing the statuses of the goods. In Avito's manner. Usual options - pending, published, rejected.  Great edits in platform design are expected too. Switching the pictures, specifying the price of order (either ascending or descending), adding to favorites, viewed products. The new design waits for the tab "Orders", for a more comfortable view.   In tabs with goods are also planned small changes. For example, you can ask seller a question about his product and view the history of purchases. That is, the amount of purchased goods will be displayed directly next to the product.  That's how it's going, my friends! Believe me, we are waiting for these updates as you do!  See you at FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: A safe transaction, or what to do if you are a skeptic person, but you really want to start buying online    Hello! Are you ready for interesting facts? In 2017 figures of retail sales in worldwide e-commerce equaled $2.3 trillion, and according to the forecast for 2021, revenues from such sales will grow up to $4.88 trillion.  Why are people still afraid of online-shopping despite such figures? We conducted a survey among our users and the most popular answers to the question are:  Fear like "expectation-reality"; when the reality has not borne out the expectations. Unwillingness to pay for shipping; Fear of an advance payment, or even the whole amount of payment to an unknown person and to be duped. To give money personally to the seller-consultant is somehow safer; Desire to get at least some guarantee documents, but .... The last point, as it turned out, is the most important. Therefore, let's talk about it. How to be assured that your purchase will reach you safe and sound, or at least it will be just delivered to you. Without the call to a lawyer and other legal persons  To protect the interests of buyers from fraud, on our site there is a service called  "Safe transaction", within which FLOGmall acts as a kind of arbitrator. The transaction is done with the help of smart-contract and MLC tokens.  Making a purchase using Safe transaction, the seller receives payment only after the goods are received by the buyer. That is, until your order is on the doorstep of your house, and you do not confirm it personally, the seller will not get your money. Otherwise, you have the right to open dispute about this transaction.  As soon as the seller sends the goods, the buyer receives a track code to track the shipment and can control at any time at which stage of delivery his order is.  What will happen if the buyer wants to "dump" the seller? Buyer will not want it, because he will be motivated to close the deal in order to get an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and a positive rating as a site user.  The most curious people will ask: What other advantages does smart-contract have? Only using smart-contract you can get the most truthful information about each seller. Smart-contract records all the nuances of the seller-buyer relationship, therefore, only the person who actually made the purchase would be able to leave a feedback about the product. So you avoid thousands of sweet but fake feedbacks and reviews.  That's all for today, my friends. We are sure that only with FLOGmall you can achieve such level of trust. So, go safely to alpha version of the site, and let's start getting acquainted with e-commerce industry with cryptocurrency! Time flies, and you are still without purchases.  We meet at FLOGmall!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site

F. Express, China Post Air Mail and others. The seller may include delivery in the price of the goods or put for payment separately in the cryptocurrency in which the payment of the goods. To make an order, you should create an account, choose an item & a currency what you want to use, choose a destination point, & confirm an order.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: One big story about visual content, or why video is still better than text    Friends, hello! We were asked recently "What do I need Livestore for?  I can easily watch video on youtube. How do you want to surprise me?". Therefore, we would like to answer this questions immediately! All advantages of Livestore and visual content are mentioned in this post! Let`s go!  In his question our opponent did not take into account some of the most important features of the project, that are the key ones and do not regard Livestore and video sales. However, first let's tackle the question of the need for these innovations.  Why is Livestore necessary, and how is it going to deal with problem of the confidence to the seller? Initially, video is more attractive way of interaction with the audience. First, it provides an opportunity to increase conversion and helps users to understand the product better. As the statistics shows, after watching the video the volume of sales was raised in the online store by 64-85%.  Secondly, let's confess to each other honestly. We do not like to think. It is easier for buyer to watch video in which an unknown man will tell everything about the product, and even turn it around in front of the camera. It's easier and more pleasant than reading a long and tedious description, even if it contains the most incredible technical features. It is always more interesting to see clearly how GoPRO shoots, rather than read about the resolution of 4K video.  Statistics shows that 55% of users watch video content carefully, and this is the highest indicator among other types of content. So, people are already saying that until 2020 all online stores will be turned into video sales format.  The industry is developing fast, until recently we had mobile phones with IrDA, and a 2.0 Mp camera was considered as luxury. There was neither technology nor especially the Internet. And today we can make funny videos with cats, immediately post them on youtube and get likes and views. And it is really cool!  We have already written about our collaboration with Viuly, and if you didn't notice this text, then pay attention now. Viuly is a decentralized video platform based on blockchain. And they kindly provided for FLOGmall the opportunity to host video of our users on their platform.  Now all our video-stores will be stored and placed under the guidance of our new partner. Also, with Viuly, we agreed on a new format for video sales, which will allow to buy goods from FLOGmall directly using the video on Viuly. Functional device and working version of our technical integration will be available in the coming weeks and each of you will be able to go to FLOGmall in order to create your own video-store.  In general, it is hard to escape a conclusion that thanks to video content, the whole industry is changing radically. The buyer has the opportunity to become better acquainted with the goods, the seller has the opportunity to sell goods more profitable. Companies that use video in their marketing, from year to year, increase profits by 49% faster than the companies that do not.  Video content is a new step in the development of e-commerce. The step is high enough. No doubt.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: New updates at alpha version of FLOGmall!    We are working at alpha version of FLOGmall really hard despite the holidays.  Our developers have recently designed a new device!  Update number 1:  Now, you can add an item to cart without even being registered or logged-in user! No longer you need to overload your browser with the tabs of desired products, all that you need will wait for you in the cart.  However, for buying goods you should pass the registration procedure that takes one minute.  Update number 2:   At the alpha version not only the catalogue was modified but also new positions were added to the official store at FLOGmall.  Now you can find there separated types of goods. E. g. for women and it will be written not in aliexpress style like something impossible to read and understand: "POS in-bra wire line zipper dress new shoes red or blue". Eh? What?  - Forget it!  Why?  Because now we have translator for goods and private ads. At the present moment we have only two languages, but don't worry, the list will be increased as soon as possible.  E. g.: if you want to place ads for Chinese people, everything will be translated and your buyer will understand all.  Update number 3:  The structure of catalogues was redesigned and caching was added. Thanks to this, loading became much faster.  Now, we bet you blink slower than the pages of our stores are loaded.  Continue to follow the digest, and see you again!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Evolution from the "funny money" into real means of payment. How cryptocurrency finds its true identity    In 2017 because of the realization of the rapid growth of the cryptocurrency, the world literally went nuts. Number of cryptocurrency holders is keeping increasing, its demand is growing, and the state is afraid of the impossibility of its taxation. That is why we hear all these conversations about the short-term trend and the early death of the new economic era. All media say that cryptocurrency is a bubble that is about to burst and overwhelm all its former admirers. Is it so? The main argument brought by the witnesses is the insecurity of the cryptocurrency and the rapid change of needs of audience. They say, it will be played enough and forgotten as not the most successful computer game.  Let's finally look at the cryptocurrency not as an investment, but as a real mean of payment.  There is FLOGmall. Every day at the platform, sales are made for any cryptocurrency of all varieties and colors. E.g.: right now, if you go to our website with 1 BTC, you can buy six Iphones X 256 GB, two electric kick scooters HX, and there will be still change for clothes. Isn`t it that very security of the cryptocurrency, that many people are trying to argue? Thanks to FLOGmall, cryptocurrency has quite real material security in the form of everyday goods. And it is only the beginning. This is what you can say to anyone who asks about guarantees of your investments.  Cryptocurrency is strongly breaking through the barricades, which modern society builds. For example: in January 2018 more than $1.2 billion was attracted to all kinds of ICO, and the number of cryptocurrency holders has long exceeded 10,000,000. And no matter how skeptics resist, the cryptocurrency will sooner or later becomes an integral part of everyday life along with fiat money. Do you also know this already?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How Pornhub, Brazzers and FLOGmall appeared to be in one sentence  Not long time ago Verge (XVG) token was added to FLOGmall platform; holders of this token can now buy goods at our alpha version. This token was issued by Verge Currency.  Verge (XVG) is a decentralized cryptocurrency intended for users for whom confidentiality is very important.  Before we will introduce to you more details about Verge token, let's talk a little bit about their partners.  At the present moment, it is possible to pay with Verge tokens on such resources as Pornhub, Brazzers, Nutaku. The question of pornography is quite acute in our society, however, we can not deny the fact that billions of dollars are circulating in this industry.  Fundamentally Verge is built by using a Bitcoin fork, but clearly emphasizing privacy. They use several networks with anonymity, such as TOR and I2P. The IP addresses of users are completely hidden, and it is impossible to track transactions.  Verge Currency says that its goal is to create cryptocurrency designed for everyday use by ordinary people, and its mission is to allow mankind to make direct transactions quickly, efficiently and privately. With Verge currency, companies and individuals have flexible options for sending and receiving receipt of payment.  If you are already a happy owner of Verge, welcome to FLOGmall, because now XVG token is one of the official methods of payment.  We meet at FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  The token will be used as the payment unit for all transactions in the FLOGmall system and as a basis for interacting with other digital services.  And important point is "Hedging the risks" The hedging on FLOGmall is that the artificial creation and retention of the minimum value of the official token exchange rate equal to 0.001 Ethereum or 0.3$ (calculated as the fiat equivalent value) creates a minimum conditional capitalization of the tokens and maintains this rate at a given level. This, in turn, gives confidence in the sale of tokens in the area of this value in an indefinite period of time (even with small volumes of trading on this token).  After the main ICO and site launch, it is planned to place a token on a number of other exchanges in the near future. A distinctive feature of the release of our token to the exchange is that its exchange rate will be provided by exchange on ATES. It will have its lower level, which tends to the rate of the most favorable offer on ATES (the lowest) on the day of Mallcoin release to the exchanges.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: About collaborations with US investors, and why FLOGmall needs SEC    A few days ago, FLOGmall officially passed registration with the SEC! SEC - the United States Securities and Exchange Commission.  What for? If you want a public placement of ads, your issuer must be registered with the SEC. The registration process is complicated and may take a lot of time.  How does the registration process take place? You disclose all your carefully guarded secrets, show financial reports, accept exchange requirements for the listing procedure. What is it all for? In order for exchange to determine the necessary number of stockholders, the amount of your company's income during the last year and the value of assets.  That is, in general, before passing the SEC control, your token is originally a Utility-token. This type of token is useful, but it is not item of securities, unlike Security-token.  Why did we make our token as Security token? Firstly, registration with the SEC is a obligatory requirement for our investors from the United States. Investors from the United States made it for us clear that they are ready to invest in securities and are absolutely not ready to invest in "candy wrappers" or funny money.  Secondly, now there is a positive dynamics in the listing of SEC-tokens on various cryptocurrency exchanges. Most likely this dynamics will lead to the fact that sooner or later, all tokens that can earn you money will be recognized by the SEC. We decided to take care of all legal issues and documents in advance.  As Mr. Clayton from the SEC says, almost all ICOs are security offers, but language of official documents and white paper are treated in order to show a token as Utility one.  What will happen when the SEC finds out that the Utility was sold to a US citizen being representing as item of securities? Most likely nothing good ... We are not ready to risk so much and stitch our investors up.  Here is a link to all documents in the official website of SEC :  https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1735574/000173557418000001/0001735574-18-000001-index.htm
