Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Results of the ICO. First day!  A few minutes ago (GTM) the first day of ICO FLOGmall was finished.  The fees were: 560 994$  "Strange" - the curious skeptic will say, because the amount of fees turned out to be small and reaching of the soft cap is still far away. Indeed, the amount was very modest.  Why?  Beforehand FLOGmall team decided that we will not create mass activity and flooded traffic until the start of the ICO.  That is because of the fact that at the stage of pre-ICO we already faced a hacking situation of the personal account and problems with the working process of the website. Because of it, all the activity that we created for months has gone.  We are able to put two and two together and learn through errors!  By the way, our hedge funds and investors think also so, saying that first we will just “pass through this day” and make sure that everything works correctly, and after that we will make great transactions.  Of course, before the ICO, we made a lot of security audits, we thoroughly reorganized our personal accounts and made a number of tests. However, the "combat mode" is always on as the best way of security, so today's day can be considered as the day of "breaking-in" the whole system.  For those who have already purchased tokens: we express you a special respect from our team and thank you for the trust!  ICO stage will last until June 26 and now, when we are sure that everything is working correctly - we can move into the stage of active PR and advertising.  We remind that during the first days of the start of ICO, there are special bonuses for you up to + 25% to your deposit. Do not miss the chance to get more tokens to your deposit in the first days of sales!  In order to purchase tokens - use the personal account: https://crowdsale.flogmall.com/

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: There are six heroes in the TV series “Friends“, and FLOGmall has even senenteen friends-altcoins. Therefore, make your tea, open medium and… enjoy your reading!  Greetings, ladies and gentlemen! We have already started to introduce new altcoins, located at the site, when suddenly it turned out that you don’t know even the old ones. To avoid a lot of questions, let’s devote today to analysis of “inhabitants” of the alpha version of our site. There are six heroes in the TV series “Friends“, and FLOGmall has even senenteen friends-altcoins. Therefore, make your tea, open Telegraph and… enjoy your reading! You are all already here experienced cryptousers, so we sincerely hope that such giants as Ethereum and Bitcoin do not need to be presented. You all know about Buterin and Satoshi, these names sound from almost every Chinese alarm clock. Their younger brothers Ethereum Classic and Bitcoin Cash live on our site. ETC is the same blockchain platform for developing decentralized applications based on open source smart contracts. Just remember that ETC is the fifth largest crypt in the world, and that’s enough. Bitcoin Cash is a Bitcoin fork. Another Bitcoin Fork is Litecoin. Peer-to-peer electronic payment system, the fourth largest cryptocurrency by the value of the total cost. Greetings to Monero. Cryptocurrency based on the CryptoNote Protocol, designed to maximize anonymization of your transactions. It’s another fork, but already from Bytecoin, which came to this world in 2014. Such a thirst for anonymity gave rise to accusations of Monero in “aiding” the trade in drugs, weapons and pornography. In General, the dark side, and all that. But this is only the tales of Sherwood forest, while the popularity of Monero is growing. By the way, our second charity project — Real.help likes to mine this crypto. Another diarie from the TOP10 popular cryptocurrency is Dash. It is an open decentralized payment system, also is a fan of the anonymous transactions mechanism. There is no central management, emission occurs on mining. IOTA is a new open source distributed register that does not use a blockchain. IOTA transactions are free regardless of their size, transaction confirmation time is small, the number of transactions processed at the same time is not limited, and the system is easy to scale. And it’s a real miracle, friends. NEO and the company Antshares behind it, is the first blockchain party in China. It combines traditional mechanisms with the digital economy, calling it a kind of smart economy. It manages intellectual assets by using the blockchain, and indeed for a long time already takes pride of place in the TOP10. Another participant in the TOP10 of the world ranking of the world’s celebrities crypts — Ripple. It was launched in 2012 and reached the mark of only $0.8. The Protocol supports tokens, commodities, or other items such as frequent flyer miles or mobile minutes. It’s decentralized and it operates without the participation of Ripple company, all kinds of banks and other divine intervention. Ripple fork — Stellar is also conveniently located in the payment methods on our platform. It is a real-time currency trading platform supported by the Stellar Development Foundation, a non-profit non-stock fund. Come on, let’s find out about the little-known. Which you will not find in Wikipedia, and learn only from us. Hello, Cardano. Again, a decentralized platform that provides integrated programmable value transfer. It dreams to create decentralized applications and contracts in an inexpensive and painless way. Written in a highly protected language Haskell, if that’s what it says to you. EOS — a new architecture of blockchain, designed vertically and horizontally, along and across to scale decentralized applications. Million transactions per second and the solution of problems of excessive traffic? Yes, it’s here. What do you know about the Throne? It’s no longer a sci-Fi movie, it’s a blockchain Protocol to create an entertainment system around the world with free content. Well, finally, someone smart enough to earn on mems and funny youtube videos! The first Tron app has already appealed more than 10 million users. The first company, that have created a platform for using the traditional currency as Bitcoin — Tether. Their crypt has no centralized issuer and can be available for issue to everyone. Using digital equivalents of real currencies, Tether ensures the stability of quotations. The tether platform currently uses virtual analogues of the Euro and the us dollar (for example, 1 us dollar — 1 USDT). NEM — new economy movement — cryptocurrency written in Java and JavaScript. NEM is special, it forms a blockchain with the use of an importance proof algorithm. Look, your right to form a block is affected by three components: the balance of the wallet, the activity of the account (the number of transactions) and the time of the account on the network. This is a completely new platform.Check it out! You have already read about our partners Viuly and ColossusXT in another posts. But we have some other old friends that we have wrongly kept silent about. It’s KickICO. Their platform was founded with the purpose of carrying out activities for the collective fund raising for the benefit of the realization of human ideas. By using the site KickICO now anyone can create a campaign for the ICO. Do you want your own token? It will take a couple of minutes with KickICO. Well, are you tired of discussing the ideas of decentralization of the economy, democratization of Finance, freedom, equality and brotherhood? Let’s take a break for the weekend, and we will continue from Monday with a brand new Altcoins, “inhabiting” the FLOGmall platform.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Wanna try mining?    What`s the connection between Bitmain, FLOGmall and Wall Street? Good news! If you feel like you are miner, join us here as soon as possible! Because the official store FLOGmall received a big batch of ASIC from the company Bitmain. This company is the largest manufacturer of mining equipment from China. To make for you everything clear, they have already signed the agreement about the location of the mining firm in Washington and they say the whole Wall Street is already nervously talking about it everywhere even in couloir (French “corridor”).  Now you can buy any Bitmain`s equipment in the official FLOGmall store with any crypto currency from the payment list. Think about it. It’s possible to buy the device that gains crypto also with crypto. It’s almost like buying 100$ with Olympic symbols for 150, but in case with crypto it’s even profitable. This investment won`t demand extra money, vice versa it will produce additional profit. It`s like your children after eighteen. FLOGmall takes care about the transportation of your goods on the territory of the whole Russian Federation and CIS countries. By the way, this is what our Cargo 677 does, that inner nature you could know because of the video in the previous post. No longer you need to contact the manufacturer directly, we will bear all the difficulties of negotiations for you. Next step — we control quality of the goods, pack your order, ship and deliver it directly to your hands. In general, we provide full assistance of the goods during the transportation without unnecessary talks and problems. At the present moment our team deals with expanding the list of equipment for mining. In case you did not find the necessary provision or for example you want to mine only on Antminer X3, and on others it`s not allowed for you because of the religion, just tell your wishes to our specialist. Don`t be shy. In alpha-version of FLOGmall you can find feedback form and send a letter with your request. So, are you ready to begin your own marvelous experience in mining with the help of FLOGmall? *mining — is the processing of transactions, in the digital currency system; process which extracts value from Bitcoin

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Friendship in style of FLOGmall. New collaborations!    The society is slowly moving to blockchain technology, because it is fast, convenient, and everyone likes the idea of decentralization. If you monitor the rapidly developing world of cryptocurrency or if you are even ready to roll up a small blockchain revolution with us, you will definitely appreciate the information below. So, our new partners – a young platform Viuly, but which has already blown up its audience. They position themselves as a decentralized video platform based on blockchain technology. And yet it is possible to earn some money, because their ICO has already passed. Not bad, huh?  What is decentralization and outright revolutionary of Viuly? Here,let’s take, for example, YouTube. All uploaded videos on YouTube are stored on Google's servers, that is, all uploaded material is under the control of a certain group of people. And if Petru from Google doesn't like the video with your dog, it will be removed immediately at his discretion.. Viuly developers claim that videos uploaded to their platform will be stored on the servers of millions of people. And it’s up to the users to decide which video to block and which not to block.  Another plus is that there is no barrier between the advertiser and the author: neither language nor financial. It is rumored that the advertiser will no longer overpay, and the author of the video will not give 60-70% of the income to the creators of the platform. It’s about decentralization.  Now, what is the essence of our friendship? You have been asking question for a long, what are the strengths of FLOGmall and the fundamental difference from other e-commerce platforms.Exactly! It’s stores in a unique format of a Livestore. Viuly kindly provides the opportunity to host videos of our users on their territory. Now all our video stores will be stored and placed under the leadership of our new partners. Also, we have agreed with Viuly on a new format of video sales, which will allow you to buy products with FLOGmall directly from the video on Viuly. The functionality and working version of our technical integration can be seen in the coming weeks and each of you will be able to go to FLOGmall in order to create your own video store.  And, as you might guess, the Viuly token has already been added to the alpha version of our site, and if You are the lucky holder, you will discover a marvelous new world of goods for your favorite cryptocurrency.  Isn't that a miracle, friends?  Read more about our next collaborations (and they are already >45, for a second) You will learn from our everyday posts. Stay in touch, what suddenly Your favorite token will also soon appear in the ranks of FLOGmall?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  For customers:  1.Exchange of cryptocurrency for First Marketed Consumer Goods (FMCG) and Services on our Platform FMCG - a variety of electronics, household appliances, clothing and everything that every person needs every day. We used to buy these goods in regular online stores and retail chains.  Among services it is planned to launch such areas as real estate (rent, sale), digital-marketing, financial services and so on.  2.Access to goods and services from around the world Our platform serves as a single aggregator of a large number of sellers and stores from around the world. This will save a significant part of the funds on purchases, as the seller will sell the product or service directly to the customer, bypassing intermediaries that are large retail chains, as well as aggregators of various services, including financial institutions and payment systems.  3.Transparent and safe purchases FLOGmall offers the customer a fundamentally new look at faceless online stores and e-commerce sites with thousands of sellers.  Each customer repeatedly encountered the fact that when viewing the catalog of goods/services on the site, he/she cannot get a real idea of the store/seller. We see pages of absolutely identical images and descriptions for the same goods.  With online purchases, in most cases, we cannot go to the seller on another continent to see the goods live or evaluate the service offered in person. Many purchases have to be done almost with your eyes closed. Of course, the issue of trust in the seller at the time of purchase has always been and will be relevant.  Thanks to the unique format, FLOGmall allows to follow the assortment and events of the store, and crucially - to make sure clearly that the seller really exists and it is exactly who claims to be.  The e-commerce industry and video blogging has been going hand in hand for many years. Now both these industries are used on a single site. The era of impersonal online stores with gray catalogs is a thing of the past, they are being replaced by live stores with real people.  4.Payment by any altcoins Imagine the following situation: the buyer has traded on cryptocurrency exchange for a long time. As a result, he has left a certain amount of cryptoassets, which are not the most demanded. Cryptoasset does not move on the exchange and remains unused by the buyer. Or, for example, the investor has participated in many other ICOs, purchased their coins, but the issued tokens have not gained or gained insufficient cost at the moment.  On the other hand, there is a seller who is not against selling his/her product/service with this particular cryptoasset. Thanks to flexible FLOGmall filters, the customer easily finds such a seller. As a result, the customer solves the problem of selling the "hung" cryptoasset, and the seller gets a profit in the cryptoassets that he/she chooses himself/herself.  5.Fair information on each seller Smart contract with a secure transaction fixes the interaction of the seller and the customer, so only the person who made the purchase, would be able to leave feedback about the goods.  The rating system allows you to evaluate the store on the basis of real statistics on 4 key indicators (the delivery time of the goods, the correspondence of the goods/ service description on the site to the obligations fulfilled, the price of the goods, the friendliness of the seller when communicating with the customer).  6.Real, detailed responses on each of the products If the customer wants to purchase a particular product, then when viewing the product card the system will automatically show all the video reviews and responses on it on the site. And since a review or a response can only be made by a real customer, then such information can be trusted.  7.Cashback and discounts for internal cryptocurrency The FLOGmall site provides customers with increased cashback when paying Mallcoin tokens, as well as the opportunity to receive discounts when purchasing goods for Mallcoin.  8.Secure purchases using a smart contract Listing the fee, the customer can be sure that it will go to the account of the seller only if the goods reach the destination point. As soon as the seller sends the goods, the customer receives a track code to track the shipment and can at any time see at which stage of delivery his/her order is.  Based on the executed smart contract, the site automatically transfers funds to the seller's account only after the customer confirms the receipt of the goods and its proper quality. Otherwise, arbitration on this transaction will be opened.  In this case, the customer will be motivated to close the transaction due to the fact that he will receive an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and rating as a user of the site.  9.Simple navigation on offers of sellers The site provides convenience of searching and studying the product range. The catalog of products on FLOGmall is equipped with filters and division into categories, which makes the search effective for the customer.  10.Convenient display of prices with reference to Fiat/Cryptocurrency Sometimes it is difficult for a customer to assess how profitable to buy a particular product/service in foreign currency. It is even more difficult to calculate the benefits in cryptoassets, the volatility of which is much higher than that of fiat money.  FLOGmall displays the prices in the selected cryptocurrencies with their equivalent in US dollars, which is most convenient for the majority of customers to perceive.  11.Purchase of goods/services with cryptocurrency WITHOUT participation and commission of the site If the customer makes a purchase from a seller who has collected enough positive responses and estimates, he/she can with minimal risk make payment directly, without the Secure Transaction and the guarantor from our site. Thus, the site does not impose its services on customers and always offers an alternative.  12.Sellers Moderation At FLOGmall, bona fide sellers are placed, who undergo an internal moderation before the publication of goods and services.  13.Multilingual communication FLOGmall offers tools for effective communication between customers and sellers. Built-in online translator, integrated with Google Translate, allows you to negotiate the purchase of goods/services in a multi-language format, without going beyond the platform.  The user and seller can communicate with each other in their own languages, and FLOGmall will automatically translate their correspondence, making it understandable.  14.The role of the community in the development of FLOGmall FLOGmall allows ordinary customers to participate directly in the life of the project. Customers can vote for their favorite sellers, record detailed responses and earn on it, thanks to the contests.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How to earn on the quantity of friends, and why this phrase does not carry evil intent    How to earn MLC tokens without getting out of bed? Use your referral link from your personal account for its intended purpose! Just send it to all contacts, tell a friend about the project, maybe even a few, share with your parents, involve neighbors in this carousel. All registered on the site will be added to your personal referral program with profitable purchases and various bonuses.  You get 5% of all tokens purchased by your referrals. That is, if your referrals buy, for example, 6000 MLC  (which is equivalent to 3 ETH and $1190), you will receive 300 MLC, and they will get $ 60. Not bad for the first time? And now sit down slowly on a chair, because we will tell you that all your bonuses are summed up!  To prevent your friends from accidentally deciding that you are cashing in on their reposts, FLOGmall gives each of your referrals - 3% of MLC tokens from the purchase amount. What did you think? FLOGmall will not offend the crypto-enthusiast! Bonuses are credited after the ICO stage and only to your personal wallet specified in the personal account during registration.  There is one rule of the cryptocurrency club: absolutely no spam. All advertising channels are carefully analyzed and if you are a great experimenter and ignore the rules, we will be forced to take action. Bonuses are canceled, and your account is blocked forever. Forever. And do not even think about fakes.  And now - the most interesting. We hold an additional competition among the participants of the referral program. This is not a "Hunger Games", there will be several winners. Prizes will be shared by three participants, whose referrals will acquire the largest number of MLC tokens. The contributions of each participant are summed, and therefore the main criterion in the selection of the winner will be the sum of purchased tokens MLC by its referrals. So, prizes:  The first place and a cool electric scooter HX. And it does not matter where you will ride it - along cobbled European streets or in Russian remote Siberia, you will enjoy this win absolutely.  Second place - Apple AirPods. Yes, yes, the ones that are wireless, which will not get tangled in your pocket.  Third - a backpack XD Design 15.6 Click. Laptop for work? Grandmother's pies? 13 homeless kittens? This backpack will fit everything.  The results of the competition will be announced within 10 days after the end of the ICO. The notification of the results will come via a general mailing list, and, of course, will be published in all official communication channels.  Why are you still watching how the scooter drives beside you? Do not miss your chance, put a tick in the calendar, hang a reminder on the mirror in the bathroom, and ...  Stay with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Asian blockchain, what are you? FLOGmall personally figured out in Hong Kong    The company Cryptoevents Asia, which deals with investment relations and the generation of all sorts of events in the field of blockchain, brought together on Invest Week-end cool projects, seasoned them with private investors and investment funds and sent them on a yacht to the open sea. By the way, the company has been operating in the Asian market since 2005, and their methods work!  A closed meeting with a cocktail party, a section of business knowledge, meetings with VIP investors, non-stop pitching and even first cryptocurrency ATMs (which you did not really see) was held from 6 to 8 April in Hong Kong.  The official partners of the event were IbdI, an organization that unites the associations of the blockchain community , Genesis Block - crypto-enthusiasts, with a global mission: to bring cryptocurrencies and blockchain to the masses, Startup Grind is a global startup community created with the support of GOOGLE for training, encouragement and communication of entrepreneurs, The Bitcoin Association Hong Kong are those who support the bitcoin enthusiast communities for the further advancement of their technologies.  In these two days members of our team – Maxim Teleshev, Alexei Belov and Hermogenes Korolev presented the project to a narrow circle of interested audience, revealed to us the secrets of product promotion in the Asian stock market from leading experts and have institutionalized the practice of intercultural communication. Pitch was a great success, investors showed interest, asked questions, took contacts and promised to support the project. This trip gave us another interesting experience that has already grown into quite a specific negotiation. FLOGmall acquires new supporters and gain more hearts.  In the near future, on April 16, our team will be in Dubai at another global meeting. We are trying to work out our road show with maximum quality in order to show all the possibilities of the company to potential investors in practice.  Are you still not at the club who joined us? So go to the our website & register. ICO is coming!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Three ways to earn tokens, for which you do not have to fall into a debt hole    You still haven't heard anything about all the benefits of the airdrop campaign, and for you it's just a button on your Iphone? Then read the text below as closely as possible, because it is with its help you can earn cryptocurrency without overstretching any of the muscles of your body.  To begin with, what is airdrop. This is a free distribution of tokens to absolutely everyone for a very simple algorithm of actions. Usually, the company that distributes free coins by airdrop will not ask you for a long testing of bugs, nor the translation of whitepaper into seven languages of the world, nor thinking about the design, advertising in their own social networks. Nothing that can make you cry from exhaustion like Kim Kardashian.  No need to learn complex spells, search unicorn horn or carry the ring to Mordor. All you have to do is to create a crypto-wallet. In order not to suffer with the choice of the desired cryptocurrency, the transition to its official page and registration of the wallet there, we can go the path of least resistance. Take MyEtherWallet (MEW) - one thing, and create an account there. Converting from the stock exchange in MEW any number of Ether and waiting drops. There are other blockchain platforms that deal with the same algorithm, but MEW is the most popular web wallet that supports most tokens.  By the way, FLOGmall has already held its airdrop-campaign and, it is said, its members have already caused violent flows of friends' envy, because already at the end of the ICO they will have the n-th number of our tokens and half-kingdoms in addition.  Method number two. A bit more complicated, but from this - no less pleasant. It is necessary to sweat a little:  adjust the internal compass on search of free distributions and bonuses.  Many companies in the course of advertising strategies arrange massive free distribution of coins. Mother Teresa-style way to tell about the project to a wide range of users. Most cryptocurrency startups have a marketing budget (seriously?!) and free distribution of tokens is one of the popular ways to spend it. If you hang in our telegram for a long time, you already know that FLOGmall allocates 75% of its budget to carry its idea to the masses. And our users who have logged onto the stage of pre-ICO can already see the bonus tokens in their accounts, to go there day and night, to admire and show others. All you had to do was to register on the site, deposit any amount in Ether, let it be your favorite number, mom's birthday, or the number of posts of your president, and wait. Someone additionally asks for a subscription to communication channels, such as Facebook, twitter, instagram, but you already know that FLOGmall was born to make life as easy as possible for its users.  The third way, the final one. You perform simple tasks, but it is worth noting that you receive insignificant money for this. There are a number of projects that are ready to pay you small amounts in a crypto currency equivalent for a number of simple actions: viewing advertisements, performing tasks, like posting about project on personal social networks and even playing games. You can play dice, casino, play solitaire, watch commercials at least for days, and you will get tokens for this. That's all, friends. Now you have several magical ways to try to earn a couple of tokens. Sleight of hand and no fraud!  So, and why are you still sitting in the telegraph?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: 16 days left ... ICO is close!  You know that FLOGmall strives to give the best to its neighbor. Therefore, and its arrival is slightly shifted, according to a new schedule, we will start on April 26 at 14:00 Moscow time. Why so late, and how much can you wait?  First, we decided to do more fundamental work on bugs in the alpha version. Because, Measure three times before you cut once.  Secondly, at the moment a huge layer of work with funds is carried out within the project. And this, as you can understand, together with lawyers, hard work, paperwork, all sorts of checks.  Third, the collaboration. We are negotiating with other platforms, the owners of the altcoins, the masters of the ICO and the geniuses of startups. But this is a saying, the end of which we are not ready to reveal to you yet.  Of the other, equally important news, we will report gradually in all official communication channels. Be decent crypto-enthusiasts, stay in touch with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall's ICO from any other ICOs is the built-in automatic exchange of tokens, that is called ATES (Automatic token exchange service), FLOGmall to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic exchange of tokens occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site.  When buying FLOGmall tokens at the pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a significant discount on token purchase. The platform sets the official rate for the sale of MLC tokens on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) equal to 1/1000 ETH, which is higher than the selling of MLC tokens on the pre-ICO and ICO stages.  After launching the site, the token holder gains access to ATES At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. At ATES, he can exchange his tokens purchased at the ICO stages both with sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of FLOGmall operation and ATES operation, users get the opportunity to exchange their MLC tokens with other users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Have you missed the updates to the alpha version of FLOGmall? Keep the pack right away. We had two busy working weeks, four programmers and 140 servings of shawarma from a kebab house to get half a kilo of updates of all varieties and colors. So, let's get going.  Our developers have put together the top products for stores. Now you can in a random order see the best of the best, products that are most in demand among the audience and have forever won the hearts of their consumers. If you, of course, trust the public opinion.  If you deny the existence of a computer or for any other reason surf the Internet just on a mobile phone - now we have a convenient mobile menu for the most pleasant acquaintance with our product.  Recalculate the value of the goods from one currency to another? Easily! Our platform offers the functionality of the global currency, and if you, for example, do not trust the artificial intelligence of a third-party converter, you can no longer use it. Our platform will do all calculations on its own.  Long ago you had to communicate with your seller by e-mail. Forget this relic of the distant past! The complete functionality of the basket, ordering and chat integration are already waiting for you in the platform.  Are you afraid to miss something new, are you anticipating new goods to be bought with the crypto currency more than New Year, Birthday and Easter altogether? Then click ‘Subscribe to updates’, yes, yes, now we have a subscription.   Have you forgotten your password? Are you tired of the old password? Have you quarreled with a girl whose date of birth was a password? Remove it! Change / delete /reset functions for your password, new possibilities for avatars in your account, artistic profile editing, image slider in the section of private ads and other features are awaiting your appreciation.  Therefore, let’s move on, friends! Watch a video or go to the alpha website and see everything yourself.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: We are now working through completely legal schemes through some jurisdictions that will allow us to receive documents in general. Only we are not ready to officially declare this until there are concrete cases. Again, the tax reporting. For example in the Russian Federation. There are schemes of taxation in which the seller does not have to bear strict reporting on the documents. I sold it for the crypto currency, brought it out, spent (if I want) as payment through cash. And this all my reporting. Same thing in China. There's generally sales through weChat happen. The Chinese do not report on these operations. They also use a simplified tax system and pay their share of taxes.  Large companies are not yet able to sell, those that use VAT. To sell the goods, they will have to have a subsidiary with another taxable base.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: From practice to theory and vice versa. We dismantle the scam: stay there.    According to the dictionary "scam" is a deception, a fraud. We make a note that it's not good to deceive people.  After getting acquainted with this article, you will learn how to recognize a certain scam out of a thousand cases.  We begin with an introductory tour. Did you watch the film Ocean's Eleven? Most of the scams are so clumsy that they do not even closely resemble the sophisticated machinations of Ocean and his guys. All the scams can be divided into two unequal types. The first type is subjective - it is the most common, unoriginal fraud, when someone collects your money via the distribution of loud promises about the myriad wealth, the house in the Maldives and the gold of the gnomes in the attic, he buys this house to himself, and next day he is out the reach and the border country of your residence.  There are the objective scams also. When the project is like an immature teenager: small, complex and does not think about his actions, and the team, which is working on it, cannot find a common language and, instead of looking for a specialist, it punishes him immediately. Objectively, it is a failure; no money will pull them out of the dug hole. But who cares about objectivity, when money is burnt?  Unfortunately, there are more and more projects like that in the industry nowadays.  Let’s discuss the structure of subjective scams, and how they can threaten Let's take a look at the examples of subjective scams.  1. Christopher Columbus was discovering America alone, so he did not have a problem, which we will discuss further. If the project has three or more founders, then the common language is more difficult, and sometimes it happens that one of the comrades says his loud "It’s OK this way!". He folds his hands in pockets and legs on the table and stops working at all. The same thing was with one ICO project of social network on the blockchain, one of the founders just disappeared in an unknown direction even before the network was completed.  2. The second rule is "do not take the dirty linen out of the hut." The quarrel ruined ICO: in 2017, the Tezos service died in such a way. The investors of the project filed the complaints due to the fact that the founders could not divide the assets among themselves. Was it the intent to cheat - it is a controversial issue, but in any case, it plunged the project into an intermediate state between the subjective and objective scam. And all the same, the innocent investors suffer from that.  3. The sense of humor of the founders often also makes a profit, even if the humor is black. It was possible to collect up to 1 000 000 dollars for ICO project Piramidum and a number of other ICO-jokers, who initially stated: love me for who I am, I cannot promise anything and I will not do anything either. But black PR is also a PR, people liked it and the pump reached the unprecedented heights.  This is all a subjective scum, when the founders have a clear intention to deceive you but there is no conscience. And now we are going to discuss the objective scam and a couple of secrets of his identification  The objective scam is much more difficult to recognize, it requires special skills, analytical mindset and the willingness to spend a lot of time to study the problem.  We would recommend a number of simple techniques we find effective, so that the range of accidents should be narrowed to the minimum:  1. Study the methodology of A. Pavlyut on the evaluation of WP: in fact, it means that the White Paper should simply and easily expose the project. If the creators twist idioms as they want - blow the horn! There is clearly something wrong here. The exceptions, such as ICO Telegram or Filecoin will always be, but they are exceptions.  2. Focus on the team's experience. In most cases, the team that gathered only under the ICO and does not have experience in real business for 3-5, or better - even more - years - it is the story without a happy ending. Do not believe me? Look at e-commerce projects in Russia or even some of the dotcoms in the early 2000s in the US, and everything will fall into place.  3. And most importantly: estimate the level of involvement of team members in the project. For example, if a project is about the implementation of a new technology in blockchain, and it is headed by the project lawyer and three more workers specialized in humanities, a reasonable question arises. And vice versa, when the project is technically simple, but overcomplicated with economical and financial concepts, IT professionals team is not a good choice.  The described things could be considered simple, but all together they create the foundation, on which you can build your own financial well-being and critical thinking towards the ICO projects.  Friends, tomorrow we will move from theory to practice. Stay in touch, we will analyze the concrete examples of the scam on your fingers, think together how this could be avoided, and get a little homework to determine the inner world of one of the last scam.  See you at FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello:) This was an answer for you posted on March, 24:  Hello)  The price will be 0,001 ETH. Investor's benefits:       1.The increase in the token value after the launch of the site      One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall ICO from any other ICO is mathematically justified possible benefit, calculated by means of the built-in FLOGmall ATES (Automatic token exchange service) to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic token exchange occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site. When purchasing FLOGmall tokens in pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a substantial discount on their purchase. After the main ICO, the site launches the process of its monetization through the provision of additional services and functionality. The site undertakes to ensure that the token rate on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) will be higher than the rate that was in the pre-ICO and ICO stages.     After launching the site, the token holder accesses to ATES. At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of work, FLOGmall shares the proceeds of the site with the holders of the tokens. Also, the holder can realize purchased tokens to any user who sees the growth prospects for the token due to the closest placement of the token on the exchange.         2.Mallcoin token release to exchanges      3.Hedging the risks      The hedging on FLOGmall is that the artificial creation and retention of the minimum value of the official token exchange rate equal to 0.001 Ethereum or 0.3$ (calculated as the fiat equivalent value) creates a minimum conditional capitalization of the tokens and maintains this rate at a given level. This, in turn, gives confidence in the sale of tokens in the area of this value in an indefinite period of time (even with small volumes of trading on this token).      4.Discount up to 80% on site services      If you have been thinking for a long time and considering FLOGmall as a trading platform as a professional seller, then becoming a holder of tokens for pre-ICO and ICO, you get a discount of up to 80% on the services of the site immediately after its launch. If you are considering FLOGmall from the point of view of an ordinary customer, then becoming a holder of tokens for pre-ICO and ICO, you get the opportunity to exchange tokens for goods with the benefit of up to 80%.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Again a conference ?! FLOGmall to you with new victories    A two-week forum, Cryptonomics Capital, in Moscow ended on March 28. And our co-founder, Maxim Teleshev, returned home from it.  Cryptonomics Capital is a large investment fund, which gathered thousands of investors and presented hundreds of products. And this is exactly this exclusive product line that makes different this rapidly growing start-up. Specialization - almighty cryptocurrency and incendiary ICO, naturally.  Our task at this forum was not only to show the goods itself, but also to make useful acquaintances, join the party, and go to the intelligence service in the capital's cryptopolis.  And this is exactly this particular forum where we got to know the famous actor and philanthropist, Konstantin Khabensky. The only one who broke through the barricades of those wishing to get acquainted with the projects, two-meter guards and another small door of the black entrance, was our Maxim Teleshev. I took a breath, discussed our second charitable project real.help, showed in details the strengths and advantage of technologies and handed over all the documents.  For closer acquaintance.  Also, we got in touch and talked with the head of the Cryptonomics Foundation, the host who mentioning it? Because if FLOGmall is already a growing almost independent child, then real.help is still a baby that it desperately needs attention. Through interaction with the cryptocurrency fund, we will be able to reach the right media channels, which will be able to share the big deal to the world, which means that even more children will be able to get all help they deserve from our project.  They did not ignore FLOGmall, boasted how successfully we completed the pre-ICO, which was very interesting to the head of the Cryptonomics fund. Decent end of the party is what? That's right, the exchange of contacts. We did not avoid this rule and have already contacted the fund, sent all the necessary documents, and, perhaps very soon, you will learn about another interesting collaboration.  But it's not so easy to stop the founder of international e-commerce, who has already begun to enjoy a taste of Moscow's crypto parties. A new day is a new forum. On March 29, we were waiting for #Decenter Cryptoevent Moscow 2018, and it was completed for our project as fruitfully as possible. Almost like the annual harvest of potatoes in Belarus, but this is not accurate. The forum provided us with the acquaintance of the owner of one known exchange, Dmitry (for objective reasons at the moment we can not disclose the secret of the last name and indicate the specific name of its exchange), while the recent conference in the warm city of Sochi brought us together with another host of the exchange - Michael. And now, right now, at the moment we are negotiating the placement of branded stores selling goods with cryptocurrency.  These are all news, friends. Upcoming conference in Hong Kong, Dubai and a secret closed presentation (for a secret club of cryptic fans) of our real.help and FLOGmall projects  in the Confederation Tower in the capital.  We can not disclose all our secrets to you in one day, so we will issue them in a dosage. Stay in touch with FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  About blockchain:  1. Fair information on each seller Smart contract with a secure transaction fixes the interaction of the seller and the customer, so only the person who made the purchase, would be able to leave feedback about the goods. The rating system allows you to evaluate the store on the basis of real statistics on 4 key indicators (the delivery time of the goods, the correspondence of the goods/ service description on the site to the obligations fulfilled, the price of the goods, the friendliness of the seller when communicating with the customer).  2. Secure purchases using a smart contract Listing the fee, the customer can be sure that it will go to the account of the seller only if the goods reach the destination point. As soon as the seller sends the goods, the customer receives a track code to track the shipment and can at any time see at which stage of delivery his/her order is. Based on the executed smart contract, the site automatically transfers funds to the seller's account only after the customer confirms the receipt of the goods and its proper quality. Otherwise, arbitration on this transaction will be opened. In this case, the customer will be motivated to close the transaction due to the fact that he will receive an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and rating as a user of the site.  About our token: Mallcoin - cryptocurrency, which can be exclusively paid in the FLOGmall platform. This token will be used as the payment unit for all transactions in the FLOGmall system and as a basis for interacting with other digital services.  Some points about our token:  1. Cashback and discounts for tokens. The FLOGmall site provides customers with increased cashback when paying Mallcoin tokens, as well as the opportunity to receive discounts when purchasing goods for Mallcoin.  2. A range of additional services for professionals. The seller has the opportunity to purchase additional services on a fee basis for tokens mallcoin. Advertisements / shops with applied packages of services receive priority in the rotation of the site search.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Four interactions of relations on the e-commerce platform. Choose your favorite one!    How to protect the relationship between the buyer and the seller, what happens after the buyer sends the goods to the cart and pays for it? Who deals with the development of your transaction, and what protect the goods from unknown forces while en route? Let's figure out!  In order to elaborate all possible scenarios, we have created four possible interactions. Situation one - "impending threat". The buyer purchases the goods through a free private ad, unprotected by the "Safe Transaction" option. In this case, the buyer must independently weigh all risks, carefully come down to the choice of the seller and accept the fact that in this case, FLOGmall is not responsible for accidentally arising consequences.  The goods are paid according to requisites specified by the seller. You can choose the seller according to the platform rating  (this is the date of registration, the number of completed sales, the seller's review). FLOGmall enables any seller go through an identification process by the KYC procedure.It's voluntary, but if you are interested in increasing the level of credibility and bringing your relationship to a new level, we advise you to meet “face-to-face for an interview”.  All communication between the seller and the buyer are carried out privately, through the users accounts. It should be noted that if the seller receives complaints from customers, the platform retains the right to decide to block a particular seller.  Pattern two is "Traditional".  Here everything is the same, only with the use of the "Safe Transaction". In this case the purchase of goods can be completed only with MLC tokens, since they provide you with the right to protect your transaction. It is simple to conduct: using our famous ATES or buying tokens at the official exchange rate of the site.  The seller receives a notification that confirms the order is paid and to send the goods. As soon as the consumer receives the goods, the system receives a notification that the transaction is successfully completed , and both parties are satisfied. And only then the payment for the purchase goes to the user account of the seller.  In the future, the seller can exchange the MLC for any desired cryptocurrency available on ATES or exchange MLC on various crypto exchanges. Also MLC can be used as a means of payment for various services on the platform, advertising, for example. If we draw an analogy from the fiat world, this pattern is similar to purchasing goods on the eBay, using the PayPal payment system.  With a  use of "Safe Transaction", FLOGmall retains a commission of 2 to 5% from the buyer.  Pattern three and four - "special." The partners of this transaction have changed: the buyer is an online store.  What will happen if the buyer's needs are not satisfied, he will not receive his goods, or his expectations will not meet the reality? In this case, the platform acts as an Arbitrator in the manual mode for each transaction. After the opening of the dispute at the site, the moderators receive an appropriate notification and are included in the process of resolving the conflict situation.  To do this they need to understand the situation better, collecting detailed information about the received goods, methods of shipping, and even provide a tracking number for the goods. The moderators will help set the record straight, deciding which party is to blame. We understand that a certain percentage of fraud from the total number of transactions from buyers is inevitable, with the entire industry. To compensate such operations, a budget will be determined from the general fund for the "Safe Transaction".  You can choose any interaction, but who will protect your transaction better than FLOGmall?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Global Blockchain Summit 2018 in Sochi: how to share best practices and leave without losses after after-party    IT-sphere masters , guru of blockchain art, free entrepreneurs, analysts and architects of business systems gathered at the Rosa-Hall MCC to create the maximum concentration of useful knowledge, unique contacts and brilliant ideas in one place. Our team in the person of Alexey Belov, Maksim Teleshev, Naomi Dai Harris and Germogena Koroleva attended day long seminars of international specialists, absorbed positive experience and carried the idea of FLOGmall to the general public.  The organizers of GBS 2018 gathered the world's best experts on blockchain technologies, among them are  the leader and ideological inspirer of Golos.Fund, Sergei Simanovsky, the blockchain lawyer, the founder of Synergis, the author of books on the legal status of cryptocurrencies, ICO and Bitcoin, Vladimir Popov, CEO of Cyber Fund, Marina Gurieva, and others.  Throughout the framework of the summit, there was an exhibition of developers and market leaders. At the seminars they analysed the development of blockchain in China with the best experts of the Middle Kingdom, the ups and downs of the cryptocurrency, and why you should not tremble towards to the decline of US stocks, made a checklist for the analysis of the ICO 2017 vs. ICO 2018 and with the help of simple mathematical calculations realized where not to stumble next time.  They discussed a lot and had fun.After a productive conference, the organizers arranged their after-party with the young ICOs and their cryptocurrencies. What are the overall results? This is again the useful acquaintances, the approval of early agreements and new interesting cooperations.  FLOGmall collects more and more like-minded people from all over the world. You can join us as well! FLOGmall is happy for everyone!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: The economics of Mallcoin, or the most important thing that you missed in the White paper    People who peruse our White Paper from time to time always fix their gaze on our financial and economic model and slowly roll their eyes in pleasure. Not only because they see the highest evaluation mark from the adviser named Kovalenko Anna Vladimirovna, but also because they are finally getting to know our token from all possible sides. Leaving no secrets between them.  Today, once again, we delve a little deeper into the economics of our token (if you are intrigued, but time, religion or calluses on your fingers do not allow you to flip through the White Paper). If you are new to our site and do not yet know what kind of merit triggered fate to brought you to our site,we will share the main bits in a nutshell.  FLOGmall provides an open source cryptographic token - Mallcoin. Mallcoin is the same full-fledged cryptocurrency as Bitcoin, Ethereum, litecoin and other coins, and they can be used as a means of payment immediately inside the FLOGmall platform.  Our token has a limited issue (250,000,000 MLC), is not exposed to inflation, weather, or psychological stress. Soon we plan to let our token grow into adulthood graduating to cryptocurrency exchanges, but while it is still living with his parents he must report all of his movements.  Why is our token so beloved by thousands of people? The most important thing FLOGmall offers to its investors is a completely new way of positive cooperation: All revenue of the project will be fully sent to ICO Mallcoin holders starting from the first day of the site functioning..  Additionally, we hold an ace up our sleeve,ATES our built-in automatic tokens exchange service. Our long term subscribers feel butterflies in their stomach once ATES is mentioned. A simple and transparent system with an internal token rate and a clear algorithm of tokens sales between sellers and buyers of the site. Nixing the necessity of using various crypto exchanges ATES allows the possibility to purchase tokens directly from the site.  The distribution of the total mass of token is fairly simple. 10% are taken by the team, 7% by the highly respected bounty participants, 9% by the reserve fund (everything for the smooth platform operation), and the rest 74% goes to our numerous ICO participants.  The FLOGmall team's tokens are blocked for 2 years with four six-month periods of usage restriction. The tokens of the advisers and the persons who rendered feasible assistance to the site in the early stages for six months.  A short three month period is given to Bounty participants. The reserve fund tokens are partially blocked. 20% provide a reliable home front to the site and can not be blocked. The remaining 80% will be distributed on the international market from May 2019, with the purpose of attracting new hungry people looking to spend a little crypto.  Also, 2,500,000 MLC will be allocated to our second charity project on the basis of Real.help blockchain.This particular number of tokens will allow maintenance of the site for 8 years and be sure that, in any twist of fate, assistance will be rendered to those in need of help. In this case, tokens are subject to gradual defrosting, on average - 1% of the total fund per month.  All other tokens are not frozen and remain fresh waiting for the new owners.  When it comes to our platform, the creation, issuing or mining of tokens after the end of the ICO period is not provided. You can transfer tokens at the end of the ICO period, but can you part away with them after such a close acquaintance?  Mallcoin has a strict binding to Ethereum, and these two have a keen connection, almost like Hachiko and the professor. Therefore, depending on the Ethereum rate change, MLC token  automatically changes accordingly . Now, at the bottom you can carefully review our table. There are all rates are displayed in $ USD for your convenience.    Now it is clear for you! Right ? With each subsequent stage of sale, the value of Mallcoin will increase. The maximum possible benefit of 600% has gone to the early preSale investors.  A possible earnings of 300% is achieved by purchasing Mallcoin tokens in the pre-ICO stage.  Bonuses of 200% can be obtained through the acquisition of Mallcoin at the ICO stage, when the bulk of the tokens will be sold. It is important to note that the Mallcoin tokens will not have additional emissions afterwards. And all unsold tokens will be destroyed.  Do not let a small but promising token die out! Go to the official website and support Mallcoin right now. FLOGmall will make it worthwhile.  Two commandments from the White Paper say: "If the minimum goal is not achieved,all collected funds will be returned to the participants." And "immediately stop the ICO after the implementation of all the tokens allocated to the participants at all stages!". So it goes, friends. We hope that we have uncovered the biography of Mallcoin from all sides, and you will no longer have questions about his childhood, adolescence or youth.  If you still have any questions, ask them in any convenient instant messengers, and we will happily chat with you about the anatomy of the crypto industry!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: FLOGmall reached the final pre-ICO stage within a month.    Friends, you've been waiting for this day, and it's come! Yesterday  on March 22 at 11 PM(GMT) we successfully completed the stage of pre-ICO! In total, 5 023,55 ETH were collected on our site, which is equal to  $2 696 883 in a simple peasant Fiat. And this is ... right, legendary!  Day and night the development team worked diligently tweaking and enhancing the alpha version of the site. All while out marketing department promoted the idea to the masses looking for like minded people. And so, we reached our goal ! FlogMall works!  We thank each person who was not afraid of skeptical opinions and cautionary advices and none the less joined our happy crypto family. It is you who ask us such a steep motion vector, thank you for helping us to realize our project to the fullest extend and giving fulcrum to change the world of the crypto industry!  FLOGmall does not stop working at full capacity. ICO is close! Have patience and inspiration. We only prosper.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello)  The price will be 0,001 ETH. Investor's benefits:       1.The increase in the token value after the launch of the site      One of the key advantages and differences of FLOGmall ICO from any other ICO is mathematically justified possible benefit, calculated by means of the built-in FLOGmall ATES (Automatic token exchange service) to another cryptocurrency.  The functionality of this service is partially similar to the internal service of mutual obligations. At the same time, it is an automatic mechanism for exchanging tokens between holders without participation of the site. Automatic token exchange occurs for the performance of a useful action on the site. When purchasing FLOGmall tokens in pre-ICO or ICO stages, a user who wants to become a token holder receives a substantial discount on their purchase. After the main ICO, the site launches the process of its monetization through the provision of additional services and functionality. The site undertakes to ensure that the token rate on the automatic token exchange service (hereafter ATES) will be higher than the rate that was in the pre-ICO and ICO stages.     After launching the site, the token holder accesses to ATES. At ATES, he/she can exchange his/her tokens purchased at the ICO stages to sellers and other users who purchase site services. Thus, from the very first day of work, FLOGmall shares the proceeds of the site with the holders of the tokens. Also, the holder can realize purchased tokens to any user who sees the growth prospects for the token due to the closest placement of the token on the exchange.         2.Mallcoin token release to exchanges      3.Hedging the risks      The hedging on FLOGmall is that the artificial creation and retention of the minimum value of the official token exchange rate equal to 0.001 Ethereum or 0.3$ (calculated as the fiat equivalent value) creates a minimum conditional capitalization of the tokens and maintains this rate at a given level. This, in turn, gives confidence in the sale of tokens in the area of this value in an indefinite period of time (even with small volumes of trading on this token).      4.Discount up to 80% on site services      If you have been thinking for a long time and considering FLOGmall as a trading platform as a professional seller, then becoming a holder of tokens for pre-ICO and ICO, you get a discount of up to 80% on the services of the site immediately after its launch. If you are considering FLOGmall from the point of view of an ordinary customer, then becoming a holder of tokens for pre-ICO and ICO, you get the opportunity to exchange tokens for goods with the benefit of up to 80%.

Author: sudhakark
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: FLOGmall is an international e-commerce website created for all the users from the people all over the world, those who can buy and sell the products by taking the help of tokens. FLOGmall is a live store which can find in a new and special format. A Live store is a set of video content and they have blogs helpful for sellers, store, goods, and services.  The idea of the cryptocurrency as a separate financial capital, that is not retained by any financial institutions and it is not possible to spend the cryptocurrency in its original form and then banks, exchange offices, inflated commissions and extravagant taxes to convert into fiat money. We can create a new form of layers for the owners of cryptocurrency; they are not traders or investors. We protect an audience that will use cryptocurrency for the purchase and sale of goods and services.  If you are using cryptocurrency and want to spend it on shopping then the cryptocurrency should exchange as fiat currency through financial institutions. By using Altcoin they will sell all the exchange of goods and services for the users.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How did FLOGmall conquer ICObench?  Most experienced crypto fans know what ICObench is. However, if you are new to the cryptoworld let us introduce you to a leader in scouting and rating ICOs. It is a prestigious international rating from top experts, analyzing the emerging ICO projects, the evaluation is highly valued by investors.  FLOGmall also did not pass up this honorable fate. If you monitor our official website every day and read the figures as a mantra, you probably already noticed that our rating has undergone positive changes. Leading experts in the field of ICO and blockchain awarded our project with the highest score - 5.0 for the ICO profile, 4.1- went to the team, 4.3 - for the vision, and for our product a 4.1.  Ten international experts evaluated our project, three of them awarded FLOGmall absolute primacy. Vladimir Nikitin, Douglas Lyons, and Mufassaire Hossain, ICO-advisors with worldly names gave the highest score in all three positions: team, vision, product.  And that's not all the good news. Our co-founders passed the KYC (Know Your Customer) acceptability standard, which allows both the financial structure to protect their interests, and the client himself takes advantage of it. Provided true information to a bank employee to choose for him such an account that will correspond to real requests - whether it's accompanying business activities or protecting assets.  These strides and positive feedback are what keep our entire team dedicated and pushing forward to develop a truly optimal ICO.  Do not you believe that we will be able to conquer this marvelous crypto world?

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: We remind you that there is only one day left to participate in our bonus system at the second level of the pre-ICO stage. At 14:00 sharp on March 16 the magic of 15-20% will no longer be available.   During this twenty-four hour period you can spend just one minute of your time to register on our private account, only a minute to read the rules of use and deposit the necessary amount. And then just sit back, relax, and watch how the bonuses multiply in your cart. They say that this is the third thing that you can watch forever.  Just to reiterate 15, 17.5, and 20% of the benefits will be waiting in your account at the end of the pre-ICO,if you register in the LAST couple days! We will not be able to hold such a proposal for so long.  If you do not have time, did not get salary on time, or did not convince your wife that your general Ethereums are worth it, do not worry. You still have time to get smaller, but also nice bonuses. From 14:00 Moscow time March 16 to 14:00 on March 20, you can pick up yourself five, ten, twelve, and fifteen percent bonuses if you wish. Experimenting with the amounts is not forbidden!  But if you like to take your time deciding, worry not!... We are still willing to accept you into our big crypto family. Five, seven and a half, and ten percent will still be awaiting your participation in the last victorious two days from March 20 to 22.  Why does FLOGmall continue to take care of its people? We have told you more than once that this is a large project,we are developing keeping the interest of everyone in mind. It can be considered, after all the secret posts that connects us, that we are already one big family. A family is and offers support.  Therefore, follow the link https://flogmall.com/, register and take your place of honor as the lucky winner of bonuses from FLOGmall!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How  to start selling goods not having a ready-made product, or why FLOGmall won 1000 real buyers without 1000 real purchases    Everyday working life had started, and the "Anatomy of the Crypto Industry" heading did not have a day off. Today we will try to figure out what to do if the demand is not proven and what if the site has not yet accumulated 1000 real purchases from 1000 different buyers.  As the saying goes,  the journey of a thousand miles starts with single step. And the way to millions of purchases starts with the first applications. So, following the simple scheme of openness and obvious benefits, we have already received more than a hundred applications for the purchase of goods for cryptocurrency via the FLOGmall platform. And this is not the limit. Why are we so self-confident and proud? Simple because we got an ace up in the sleeve .  Even now we are preparing for collaboration with the KickICO platform , which will allow the lucky owners of Kickcoin to become twice happier, and we will be a thousand times more pleased with ourselves. Spoiler: we are going to announce for them the acquisition of a wide range of products on FLOGmall.  Let us be frank: Kickcoin is not the most popular cryptocurrency because it takes a line somewhere between 200 and 400 Altcoins in the coinmarketcap list. But it's only till it becomes a means of payment on FLOGmall. We promised you to give the movement to the illiquid coins, in order to make them popular, so we do it ! Since we always fulfill our promises. In practice,we are the ones who demonstrate to you the case of selling goods for Altcoins that are not included in the top-10. It's like getting married for love, not out of calculation, and then suddenly get rich quickly, having received an unexpected inheritance from a distant relative ... which, by the way, can also be spent on our marketplace. Whatever one may say, the fate of all of us persistently leads to FLOGmall.  It turns out, in fact, not having a ready-made product, we are already launching the sale of goods on the alpha version for real Altcoins.  But that's not all! We are ahead of the curve, the individuals are keeping up with hundreds and thousands of offers of goods or services . We hear their call on various resources, branches, forums and telegram channels, and we can not simply  pass by.We will not leave our people in trouble.So very soon all these single and dropped, floating around the Internet will be digitized and gathered in a large family of private ads on FLOGmall. Even  this month any user of the site will be able to pick up the desired goods not only from the storefront, but also from the hands of a private seller.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Start of a new week for someone is a reason to refine oneself , for someone to dramatically  change life, change jobs, activities, place of residence, and for us this is a commemoration of a new upgrade of the Alpha version!  What we can present to you this week: now you and your favorite seller will have a secret of correspondence! To exchange the funny memes is not possible yet, but to communicate in the user account and in relation to the flypage- no problem!  If you are a seller, then prepare to show the goods - personally,in all its glory and advantages to the public. Now you have the right for the presentation photos. You can upload promo pictures of the product from all sides to be sure to win the buyer. Well, or just to show off ...  If you have failed to figure out the methods of payment for a particular seller, now you can relax. We solved this problem and developed  the correct display of the cryptocurrency icons specified by the seller or the store when filling in the profile after the registration as a payment method. That means if your seller can receive from you only Bitcoin or Ethereum , then you will be aware of his wish in terms of all his products. Get ready with various altcoins in your wallet, well, or wait for help from ATES (it will help manage).  No more faceless profiles! Now your happy face will be able to view the entire multimillion audience of FLOGmall (try not to be photographed in the same way as for documents). You can upload any photo (your personal one or the icon of your store), fill in the profile completely, outline the range of your interests, personal food preferences, hobbies or musical preferences. To vastly improve the search quality.   In general, the work of the service is significantly improved, but there is no limit to perfection. Our developers, although they began to sleep for a couple of hours a week more, still continue to work tirelessly on our common product.The expansion of the possibilities of personal correspondence (of course, they will become even more), the development of the cart functionality and the history of orders are already next things on the agenda of ingenious ideas FLOGmall it-guys  But this later. Have enough patience, and before tomorrow's post!

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: How to motivate sellers, and why on e-commerce “freaks” may be needed? Several authors advice on attracting an audience.    In the last post you learned about our personal methods of attracting customers.  Today we would like to add a couple drops of Tabasco to our warmest speech and reveal to you some more secret ways (not without our own experience, naturally). If you suddenly are going to start your site or just are interested in every part of the huge mechanism in the crypto industry.  The first thing that should be done to attract a larger part of a diverse audience is to create an entire list of goods at zero additional charge. This will create positive excitement around the platform and will cause the audience to trust you as Lois Lane to Clark Kent.  Being motivated is always essential. The first commandment of e-commerce is to encourage and reward your stores, thus provoking interest among new users. There is one technique we use to attract "freak-sellers",honored by the public for their madness aka dedication. Focus placed on viral advertising always works.  If you already include outstanding people in your work , you should not stop. Bloggers, celebrities, and simply public people will draw attention to your site, like Messi draws people's attention to Lay’s. Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: About the turnover per one crypto holder, and why FLOGmall is not afraid to tell, how much it has from that    Well, friends, we will continue our introductory rubric "The crypto industry anatomy", and today the burning question "from the audience" is on the agenda: how real can the commodity turnover, generated by 10,000,000 crypto currency holders be? How much can the project earn from this turnover with its services? What are the reasons for these conversions?  A long time ago in a distant galaxy, the"Remarkety" Company has conducted an independent study, which showed everyone, whose hand had ever touched a button to buy on Aliexpress. The number of users, who have ever been associated with online shopping, amounted to 1 billion people. The same study revealed the volume of the world e-commerce market for 2016, it is $ 1.86 trillion.  According to the data of this study, with the help of simple mathematical calculations, crumpled receipts and cotton buds, we built an average amount of purchases per user per year. You will be surprised but you spend around $ 1860. This is the cost of about half the house in the Russian Black Sea outback, where it smells nice of salt and baklava after the fence, and the dolphins can still pay taxes to you.  So, accordingly, the total turnover for 500,000 people will be $ 930 million. And this is only 5% of active holders of cryptocurrency!  Based on the results of the questioning of the crypt holders held by us, with our own strength, with sweat and blood, we had impressive data in our hands. 1486 people took part in an independent study, answering the questions: do you have a cryptocurrency? how you use the crypto currency? would you use the cryptocurrency to buy goods and services on a single site, along with fiat money, if there was such an opportunity? And that's what we managed to get out of this:  36% of people responded positively and voiced unrestrained desire to buy goods and services for cryptocurrency;  9% - answered negatively;  55% - have not yet decided on their crypto appropriateness.  But, like not all Gagarins are the cosmonauts, not every questioning is 100% objective. Taking into account a small unrepresentative sample of respondents, we decided to use only 15% of the actually agreed questionnaires, which amounted to the very 5%.  If you read this text just for the sake of secrecy, how much can the project earn from this, then we have nothing to fear here either. Get double leaves, write down. We identified the same amount in $46.432.542.29 of the annual revenue of FLOGmall (specified in the "White Paper" on our website), which requires only 5 of the same percentages that correspond to the regulatory values for the e-commerce market and confirms our previous calculations.  Stay with us and you will learn how to prepare the product promptly and not let the competitors to take it away, how to develop a sustainable advantage and not let it be broken.  And remember, FLOGmall is ready to share even the most terrible of its secrets.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  Aleksey Khayrutdinov is a founder and inspirer of the FLOGmall project.   Also he is the founder of Topzakazz online store and fulfillment-service Topzakazz.biz. Aleksey specializes in the successful implementation of e-commerce projects for more than 3 years, and his experience in retail is 6 years. He went through all the standard steps to launch his own online stores and enter international markets in practice. "As the owner of my own fulfillment-service and as an entrepreneur with practical experience in e-commerce, I understand how customers who make purchases through the Internet and entrepreneurs starting their own business in the e-commerce segment think. Contemporary e-commerce is in a pickle. On the one hand, there are customers whose interests are protected selectively, due to the human factor and the diversity of jurisdictions in different countries. On the other hand, there are sellers who are not able to compete with global corporations. Therefore, with the advent of Blocchain technology, I decided to change the situation.  I gathered a strong team of like-minded people who want to make the world e-commerce better, more convenient, more technological and safer. Together we want to create the first e-commerce community and offer sellers and customers a solution that will be beneficial and convenient for everyone. Such a project cannot be implemented without innovative technologies, so we need funding for project development, internal safety module audit and much more."   Alexey Belov is a businessman, a crypto-enthusiast, an investor, a business angel, co-owner of construction companies (participation in the construction of Olympic venues), manufacturing companies. Sphere of interests - knowledge-intensive business processes: special chemical materials, RFID-technologies, IT-projects. Physico-technical and economic higher education with honors. Laureate of student contests, prize-winner of the Olympiads in physics. Hobbies: healthy way of life, travel, support of science, help to the needy.
