Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: There are some problems that restrain the growth of the market and impose restrictions on it. This is the retailers’ pressure on customers and large costs of sellers on inefficient marketing campaigns.  The FLOGmall platform is designed to solve both problems, at the same time everyone - both sellers and customers - will benefit.  An individual and transparent approach to the goods and services purchase at attractive prices is possible only in the absence of the retailers and wholesale distributors intermediation. Customers should decide by themselves what goods and services they want to order. The main goal of the FLOGmall platform is to provide customers with the opportunity to choose what they need, rather than what it is profitable for retail chains to sell.  Sellers working with FLOGmall will not need expensive marketing. FLOGmall allows to create easily your own marketing programs to encourage customers directly. Thanks to the new LiveStore format, the seller has the opportunity to present the product in a more qualitative way, to increase the trust index to his own business, to win a loyal audience and, as a result, to increase sales.  The FLOGmall platform mission is to change completely the goods and services market, by using extensive experience, in-depth knowledge, as well as the interest of the largest sellers and ordinary users all around the world.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!  Our strategic advisor is A. Pierre Yurow. He is a mobile industry and Silicon Valley veteran with an extensive track record and author of four patents pending. Mr. Yurow is an active Angel Investor in Mobile focused startups across the Emerging Markets. He was the Chief Executive Officer, Head of Innovation and Co-Founder of Spectrum Mobile Ltd. He was responsible for the daily operations, new business development and the corporate strategy, product development, design and management of the global technical infrastructure. He has worked with such venture backed companies as Gamewheel, Avazu, Mobile Posse, Cellfire, Bling Software, uVuMobile, SmartVideo, 2ergo, Proteus, Virgin Mobile, Seven Networks and Wcities.  Mr. Yurow's previous roles include the VP of Mobile at Omnicom, Tanla's VP of Business Development-Americas and managed Product Development at the Associated Press AP Mobile team. He was a classmate, neighbor and advisor to Jack Dorsey, a co-founder at Twitter. He began his career at Cellular One (now AT&T). Mr. Yurow frequently speaks at mobile and digital media conferences and has successfully raised capital for numerous private and public companies.   About your first question. From the second to the sixteenth of March you can get 15, 17.5 and 20% of bonuses from FLOGmall, which will be successfully credited to your wallet at the end of the pre-ICO stage. The third stage will be marked on March 16, and a total of 96 hours will give its lucky depositors 10 to 15% of the benefits.  Good news! There are only four steps in the FLOGmall bonus ladder now, everybody will fit here! In the last fiery two days, from 20 to 22 March, the biggest fans to be late, to weigh and delay the inevitable can have time to withdraw their 5-10% on the bonus program. At this stage, the pre-ICO will be closed, friends.  We are waiting for you on our site https://flogmall.com/ seven days a week, around the clock and without lunch breaks until March 22! Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  Listing the fee, the customer can be sure that it will go to the account of the seller only if the goods reach the destination point. As soon as the seller sends the goods, the customer receives a track code to track the shipment and can at any time see at which stage of delivery his/her order is.  Based on the executed smart contract, the site automatically transfers funds to the seller's account only after the customer confirms the receipt of the goods and its proper quality. Otherwise, arbitration on this transaction will be opened.  In this case, the customer will be motivated to close the transaction due to the fact that he will receive an additional bonus in the form of Mallcoin tokens and rating as a user of the site.

Therefore, the answer is: any seller should worry about how he will deliver the goods to the buyer. Making an order will depend on a seller's requirements.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  We introduce you some our advantages:  1. Unique format of live stores: video presentation of the store, video message of the store owner to the audience, video ads for each product/service, video blog for reporting on important events and promotions, online video sales (streaming), video auctions, game models, video ads on the platform.  2. Cashback and discounts for tokens.  3. Honest feedback about every seller.  4. Secure purchases using a smart contract.  5. Payment with any altcoins.  6. Convenient display of prices with reference to Fiat/Cryptocurrency.  7. Purchase of goods/services with cryptocurrency WITHOUT participation and commission of the site.  8. Multilingual communication (built-in online translator, integrated with Google Translate).

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Friends! We have got great news for you. As you can remember, we had some problems with security, but when it had gone,it had  gone. The threat has faded , and you can safely use the personal accounts. Now all payments are effectively protected, and work in PA will become completely safe and very exciting.  First of all, we’d like to inform you that we completely isolated the personal account from the external actions.There are no third-party scripts on the pages through that attackers can replace our wallets to their own ones.  At the moment, personal accounts work in semi-automatic mode.Acceptance of payments is available in full scale, but MLC tokens are charged manually by our operator.  What can you afford? Now you can at any time of the day and even under cloud of night buy a certain number of MLC tokens as needed.You can buy even a wheelbarrow, we do not mind. Free participation in pre-ICO? It's especially for you! By the way,  we have extended the most profitable bonus system of the first three days for our most devoted adherents! Only until March 2 - 20, 22.5 and 25% of bonuses that do not absolutely hide their immediate benefits are available.  Please pay attention that during the restoration of the personal accounts all passwords had been reseted.You have to pass the password recovery procedure and enter email, which has been specified during the registration: https://flogmall.com/

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Hello!)  There are some important points for ICO participants (token holders):  - Possible benefits after starting the project with ATES (is an automatic service for exchanging Mallcoin tokens (MLC) between earlier holders and platform users). - Scheduled floatation of Mallcoin token on popular cryptocurrency exchanges. - Hedging of risks (The hedging on FLOGmall is that the artificial creation and retention of the minimum value of the official token exchange rate equal to 0.001 Ethereum or 0.3$ (calculated as the fiat equivalent value) creates a minimum conditional capitalization of the tokens and maintains this rate at a given level) - Benefit up to 80% for site services. You get a discount of up to 80% on the services of the site immediately after its launch. If you are considering FLOGmall from the point of view of an ordinary customer, then becoming a holder of tokens for pre-ICO and ICO, you get the opportunity to exchange tokens for goods with the benefit of up to 80%.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Over 672 hours of work, 12 hands and 100 liters of energy drink, and how it all turned into an alpha version of FLOGmall  Today we roll out an alpha version of the website from the garage of our developers for you. Alpha marks the advent of the era of shopping for us and this means that even today we will be able to purchase the first goods! It is absolutely legal and for a real cryptocurrency.  The last three weeks, the work in FLOGmall was boiling day and night, along with the heads of our IT-men. How do you think, have we heard about 8 hour chart? No, we have never heard about it. The guys work hard in the sweat of the face until three o'clock in the morning, ravaging the shelves in the markets with energy drinks; they do not see their wives and children. No, they are not forced, this is not slavery, the fanaticism and true love for their work looks like so.  Our developers have written the basic functionality, they repaired the personal cabinets, in which the users and sellers can live with their baskets, purchases, products, can hide the crypto currency in the wallet and conduct the secret correspondence. You will already be able to purchase the goods of your dreams, the only thing is that while sales are not yet automated, you will write to the seller from our site directly, and he, in his turn, will catch your message on his email. Yes, the purchases are still in manual mode, but they work! It's alive!  But this is a matter of time. In the beta version, the functionality will be significantly increased but this is still the top secret, let's not rush the things.  We will notify you about all updates on all our resources.  Welcome to the alpha version of FLOGmall by the link: https://alpha.flogmall.com

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: HOORAYYYY! The most long-awaited event in the world of crypto-currencies and their crypto-enthusiasts has happened! It is 11:00 GMT on the clock, which means that the official start of pre-ICO FLOGmall is announced! We hear you rejoice with us.  So, you have already registered in your personal account, received 3% on a special bonus program, passed the questionnaire, it is 2%, shared a referral link with all your friends, starting with a kindergarten, it is 5%, and what to do next? To attach the crypt to the purse! The FLOGmall gifts do not end at this!  We remind you that only in the first three days of our pre-ICO, you can become a happy owner of bonuses in the amount from 20 to 25%. From 22 to 25 February, the most explosive bonus system operates. It will turn you upside down; it will confuse the mind and make you cry. All this will happen from happiness, of course. Let's start from the small thing: if your initial contribution is 5 ETN (which transfers to 15000 MLC for our local customers and $ 4732 for the foreign ones), you will receive an income of 3000 MLC, which is $ 946, for a second. If to speak for statistics, you can connect a premium Netflix account for almost 11 years for $ 946 and watch the "Black Mirror" on the repeat without stopping. This is about whom and what does the soul rests with.  On average, an investment of 30000-300000 MLC will give you a profit of up to 22.5%, and a pleasant investment bonus starting at 300,000 MLC will be 25%, which at a minimal price is $ 24,000. Immodestly, when you consider that the token worked for itself, and you did not have to stimulate it in these three days.

Here are some plans for using tokens raised during the ICO:  - Extension of the geography of the project: Europe, Russia, Israel, Canada, United States, South and Latin America, Asian counties and etc. (attraction of sellers and customers on the site, creation of massive newsbreaks for publication in international media) - Opening of official stores selling goods for Mallcoin at a discount. - Infrastructure development. - Development of platform tools: consulting, marketing, legal support. - Development of a mobile application infrastructure. - Additional functionality (services) Stream video sales.

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: The hedging on FLOGmall is that the artificial creation and retention of the minimum value of the official token exchange rate equal to 0.001 Ethereum or 0.3$ (calculated as the fiat equivalent value) creates a minimum conditional capitalization of the tokens and maintains this rate at a given level. This, in turn, gives confidence in the sale of tokens in the area of this value in an indefinite period of time (even with small volumes of trading on this token).

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Bitcoin Garden: FLOGmall Combines LiveStore, Blockchain, and E-commerce in One Platform https://bitcoingarden.org/flogmall-combines-livestore-blockchain-e-commerce-one-platform/  FLOGmall is an international e-commerce platform created for users from around the world who buy and sell various goods and services with tokens. In practice, this is a service that does not yet have any analogs, because it offers the opportunity to pay for goods using any cryptocurrency.  What do blockchain and cryptocurrency mean for the e-commerce industry? They mean fast transactions, low commissions, and a huge potential to attract new buyers holding cryptocurrency, at a time when the world market has not yet built up a sufficient offering of goods and services for this category of buyers.  Furthermore, when working with FLOGmall, sellers will no longer have a need for expensive marketing. FLOGmall makes it easy for them to create their own marketing campaigns to directly attract buyers.  Meanwhile, buyers will have the opportunity to purchase mass-market goods for cryptocurrency. Various electronics, appliances, clothing, and other day-to-day items will now be available to token holders....

Author: Flogmall
Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: Bounty campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2790987.0  We present a new and promising project FLOGmall. It is an international platform where goods will be sold for cryptocurrency    Project site: https://flogmall.com/  Project presentation  At FLOGmall one can find stores in a new, unique format - LiveStore. A live store is a collection of video content and blogs about sellers, stores, goods and services.       Right now you can become an early investor token MallCoin (MLC) with themaximum benefit! At this stage, the MLC is 0.000333 ETH (1 ETH = 3000 MLC)  FLOGmall ICO details  ICO will take place on our platform. Period: from 26 April to 20 July, 2018. Soft cap: 5 000 000$. Hard cap: 18 000 000$. The selling rate of Mallcoin 1 ETH = 2000 MLC  In ICO you can participate with: - BTC - ETH - Dash - Doge - Kick - Litecoin - Ripple     FLOGmall history & a road map for future plans The company has a long history with a vast geography. And now, because of blockchain technology and the introduction of cryptocurrencies into circulation, FLOGmall enters the international market.      The project team has been working with each other for many years:       Links Whitepaper: https://flogmall.com/ru/wp/ Website: https://flogmall.com/ru   Community Vkontakte: https://vk.com/icoflogmall Twitter: https://twitter.com/flogmall Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/flogmallico Telegram: https://t.me/flogmallen

Title: [ANN] [ICO] FLOGMALL - An international e-commerce site
Body: This is a FLOGmall video presentation for sellers. Here Aleksey Khayrutdinov he tells about such advantages of flogmall.io usage in the future as: ✔️Access to buyers from all over the world ✔️Savings on fees of payment systems ✔️Own video-store on the platform ✔️Quick start of sale ✔️Free platform with minimum charge for additional services ✔️Ample opportunities for bloggers to promote goods via the internet ✔️Lack of competition from the e-commerce industry giants. The turnover doesn’t play a crucial role anymore to start trading ✔️Access to a new developing market of cryptocurrency holders with high purchasing power.
